Nos studios donnaient sur la 49eme rue, c'est vrai qu'on entendait les sirènes comme dans les films, comme partout aux USA.
Globalement nous avons été extrêmement satisfaits et nous recommandons vivement cet établissement.

title: Comfortable with exceptional wi-fi
text: A comfortable stay. Don't be thinking 'apartment' means sizeable though. Our room was quite small for a double. One side of the bed was hard against a wall. Do your due diligence. The wi-fi was the best I've ever experienced for a hotel.

title: Vacaciones en NY
text: Pasamos 10 días en las instalaciones de este lugar, éramos tres personas nos dieron un departamento de 2 ambientes con cocina. Súper cómodo, en la habitación había 2 camas y en el living un sofá cama. Esta en el mejor lugar de NY para salir a recorrer todos los lugares a pie o en subte. El personal súper amable hablan perfecto español e inglés. Sin duda de volver a NY nos hospedaremos allí nuevamente. Tenemos un hermoso recuerdo.

title: Posizione davvero super
text: L hotel si trova in posizione davvero strategica a due passi da times square e dal rockfeller Center. Ho usato anche l angolo cottura per cucinare cose al mio piccolo e mi sono trovata davvero bene.La pulizia non è niente male, solo la moquet a terra lascia un po' a desiderare:Nonostante venisse passata l aspirapolvere dava un senso di poco pulito. La biancheria invece veniva cambiata quotidianamente.

title: Excelente!
text: Excelente custo benefício. Hotel perto de tudo, a localização não poderia ser melhor.. Fica na rua do Rockfeller Center, ao lado da Times Square e próximo ao Central Park. Tem ainda estações de metrô muito próximas que levam a todos os lugares (uma delas, inclusive, fica na esquina do hotel). Limpeza ótima, quarto muito funcional, com cozinha equipada. Boas roupas de cama e atendimento bom na recepção. Com certeza recomendo e voltarei!

title: Great central location
text: Clean and well furnished room apartment with 2 double beds and mini kitchen great for a  family .  Room serviced every day. 5 mins to times square and Rockefeller centre, shops near by . Good value by New York prices .ask for a room at higher level for good views. Staff friendly and pleasant. Would book again.

title: Top Lage, gute Ausstattung
text: Das Radio City Appartement könnte nich besser gelegen sein. Die Metro ist um die Ecke, Broadway und Rockefellercenter sowie die 5th Avenue zum Greifen nahe. Die Zimmer sind sauber und mit kleiner Küche ausgestattet. Perfekt für einen Städtetrip in New York.

title: Excelente apart en excelente ubicación
text: Es un apart excelentemente bien ubicado, con personal muy amable y servicial, las instalaciones están muy bien y el precio es muy adecuado. Está en muy buenas condiciones y muy bien equipado. el personal habla español y son muy atentos.

title: Relación precio calidad imbatible
text: Por precio y calidad no creo q se encuentre algo mejor. El hotel es antiguo tipo 1910 lo q le da cierto encanto. Tiene cocina básica pero alcanza. Algo importante hay un súper a 2 cuadras ( food emporium)  algo caro pero infinitamente más barato q comer afuera y sí venís exhausto de todo un día de caminar podes comprar comida hecha por peso con una gran variedad y muy buena y comer en el hotel. El hotel está en el medio de todo ende si te gusta caminar casi no hace falta subte, es limpio, no lujoso pero confortable. La gente de conserjería muy correctos y si evalúas costos es lo mismo que alquilar un depto en la zona.

title: Cozy, Clean, Convienent, A really nice place to stay.
text:
We occasionally come into the city to see a show visit a restaurant or two. This is the second time we've stayed at Radio City Apartments. We reserved a standard room, same as our first stay. Much to our surprise when we checked in we were given keys to a Penthouse apartment. I questioned this and was told "you received an upgrade", what a nice surprise.  
The folks at the front desk are cheery and very helpful. The rooms are clean, smoking free and very comfortable.  
The hotel is located close to everything on Broadway, nothing is more than a short walk away. The neighborhood is clean and safe and oh so close to the subway. We've found a wonderful place to come to when we visit the city.

title: Excelente apartamento . Excelente ubicación
text: Lejos uno de los mejores apartamentos en new York . Muy bien ubicado  a tan solo dos cuadras del timesquare. Con pizzería , comida india ,comida china.en la misma cuadra.tambien está en esa cuadra la entrada al subte . Aunque recomiendo recorrer con los buses que pueden subir y bajar cuando y donde quieran!!!!!

title: Great location
text:
The location is really great - walking distance from most of the main tourist attractions. We stayed in a one bedroom apartment which was quite big for New York and more than adequate for 2 adults and 2 children. The room was very clean and serviced every day. Beds were comfortable and the kitchenette very handy for breakfasts and small meals. There's a supermarket about a five minute walk away. Staff were extremely polite and helpful. 

The view from the room wasn't great as we were at the back of the property but as we were only sleeping there that didn't really bother us. It also meant that it was quieter than I expected considering the location of the hotel. 

We would definitely stay again

title: 3 night trip to NYC with 11yr old neohew
text:
Just spent 3 nights at Radio City Apartments NYC and had an amazing time there. Hotel is very centrally located, staff were lovely. CheckIn was quick & painfree & the room was great. We had 2 very comfy double beds, a kitchenette with everything one would need, a lovely bathroom. All rooms have A/c which is a must at this time of year. Wifi is free for all guests & it is reliable!!
Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone planning a visit to New York

title: Crappy little place
text:
Currently staying in room 311, small cramped apartment, very dated and in dire need of refurbishing.Also there is some kind of machine running non stop outside the window which is a pain in the butt whilst trying to sleep!!!
Personally i would not stay here again and would not recommend it to anyone else!!!!

title: Great location 👍
text: This place was a very short stroll from Times Square. So great starting point. The apartment itself was old and not modern at all however was cleaned as good as it could be for something so dated. Lots of food around so didn't have to look to far. Pizza shop downstairs was really good. The guys at the front desk weren't overly welcoming but ask them a question and they responded back. Would stay here again really just based on location🤓

title: Nice
text:
Didn't start well when they refused to accept my visa without even trying it and demanded I go withdraw cash.
Room nice, clean but a little small but Rhys the normal for New York.
Great location and friendly and helpful staff.

title: Girlfriend trip to the city
text: This is the second time my daughter and I have stayed at this hotel, and the first time for 2 of our friends. We had a 2 bedroom apartment with a kitchen and living room area, and it was perfect for the 4 of us. Although the people at the front desk are not particularly outgoing or friendly, they were always accommodating and efficient, storing our luggage before and after check in, answering any questions we had. The entire building is immaculate, and the vintage elements beautiful. The location is perfect, walking distance to many attractions with a subway station near by. The Food Emporium, just a few blocks away, was the perfect place for a quick breakfast, snacks, drinks, or even prepared meals to re heat. Juniors, just a few blocks in the opposite direction, has the best cheesecake in New York City. We were able to walk back from the theater, as well as to Times Square, yet be away from all the chaos associated with that.

title: Excelente Ubicación y Personal ameno
text: Todo es sencillo , pero tienen todo lo necesario. WIFI excelente , Limpios , la ubicación es muy céntrica a pasos de time scuare , nos hospedamos en el ultimo piso, no molestó ningún ruido. Lo mejor resultó ser el personal muy atento y educado.

title: Great Little Place
text:
If you're looking for a great little hotel just off Times Square then this might be just the place you're looking for.

Spent 4 nights here recently and can't really complain.

The place is "old fashioned" with Art Deco features. We had a small suite with kitchen.  It's not ultra modern, but it's clean though the carpet in our room was starting to show signs of age. There was however noticeable work being done to the place to freshen up the decor.

Plenty hot water with a good shower. That is important to me. Better still plenty nice soft fluffy white towels. 

Air conditioned room, in room safe, to with lots of channels and the kitchen with a good supply of tea and coffee.

The location is perfect for Times Square and Broadway. Loads of eating places nearby so we didn't even think about dining here.

Just at the entrance to the hotel is a Pizzeria which was great. Ideal for grabbing a slice or two to take to your room in the evening if you were tired and didn't want to dine out.

If I go back to the city then I'd happily stay again. If you're looking for high end swanky posh place then it's not really for you. It was just a decent clean place to sleep so ticked all the boxes for us.

A nice touch was the computer in the hotel you could use wi printer at no charge. Great for online check in for flights and printing off any information for places to visit.

title: Great location, great apartment, overall great
text: Spent 2 nights on a mini vacation with my family and we all loved it, my one complaint was that it did not have a off load zone, but it is NY so, i guess it can be expected. So close to everything you want to have access to in midtown...and the room itself was very comfortable

title: Buen nivel, buena calidad, en el medio de todo.
text:
Fui con la expectativa alta. Leí los comentarios en Tripadvisor y dije... bien ubicado, buen precio, comentarios excelentes aquí..... no puede fallar nada. Lo tomé ...y la verdad, no falló nada.
El hotel esta bárbaro. La atención en el frontdesk de primera, en todo momento. Para los que no son amigables con el Inglés, siempre tienen un consierge hispanoparlante dispuesto a ayudar. Yo tome el apartamento para 5 personas. La verdad que muy cómodo. A dos cuadras, en la 49 y 7, hay un supermarket equipado a full.... incluso con comida ya hecha que la sirven en el momento para llevar.
Fuí en febrero, y el temor de muchos, principalmente las mujeres, de la temperatura, era totalmente resuelta con calefacción en cada uno de los ambientes del apart, hasta incluso debíamos bajarla por su alta temperatura. El departamento perfectamente equipado, de aspecto señorial, pero todo pulcro y en perfecto funcionamiento. El servicio de cuartos impecable. Una noche me quede sin TV en el cuarto, y a pesar de que había un TV LED en cada ambiente (3 en total) llamé al 0 y en 5 minutos estaba la persona de mantenimiento que resolvió el inconveniente en un minuto..... y no me aceptaba la propina, tuve que forzarlo.
Otro detalle... había comprado algunas cosas por ebay, las cuales llegaron antes de mi arribo. Previo aviso al hotel, me las guardaron perfectamente y me entregaron todo en mi check in !. 
La ubicación... para quien no conoce, ni lo dude. Para los que conocemos, no hace falta decir nada. Sí recomiendo como siempre en Manhattan, pisos altos!!... la ciudad arranca a las 5.30 hs a full.... 
Les recomiendo este lugar... mi próximo viaje, ahí estaré.

title: Home from home in the Big Apple
text:
These apartments are a good option if you are looking for budget accommodation in the heart of Manhattan because they are a very short walk from Times Square.  This is the second time was have stayed there as it is like having a home from home in the Big Apple.

One point to note when trying to find the apartments on foot - there is not a prominent sign on the building so look out for the Italian restaurant next door and you can’t go far wrong!

The apartment was clean, although the bed area had a carpet and bed-cover that I was a little wary of and would imagine doesn’t get cleaned too often.

The kitchen are had a stove-top kettle, fridge / freezer , gas hob and oven, basic cooking utensils, a coffee machine . It also had 3 sets of cutlery, mugs, tumblers and (very small) plates and bowls. There was a microwave but no microwaveable bowls. Tea, coffee and cleaning materials were supplied.

There are lots of supermarkets in the local area to get provisions.  The room was made up daily. Perhaps the only down point was that the air conditioning system was fairly noisy so I would recommend ear plugs! The curtains also blocked it at night so we had to sleep with them open although the room had a blind which helped reduce the light levels.

Our room was quiet but was not facing the road. Those rooms would be a lot noisier.
The apartments are serviced by 2 lifts, which are also used by staff. They are very slow so you get used to long waits. Wifi is free and was easily available in the room, although a little slow. The room had an in-built safe but it was very small and narrow. You can barely fit a camera inside it.

title: Un lugar a donde volvería
text: La ubicación excelente, lineas de subes muy cerca. El edificio antiguo pero la habitación muy cómoda, las camas super cómodas, en la cocina todo lo necesario. Le faltaría una tostadora y escurridor de platos. La gente de la recepción y el señor de mantenimiento, super amables y todos hablan castellano. Muy dispuestos a colaborar. La habitación un poco oscura. Muy silencioso, eso se agradece. Lo único que no me dejó muy conforme fue el servicio de limpieza. Estuvimos 12 días y creo que solo pasaron la aspiradora una vez. quedó una toalla en el piso detrás de la puerta y allí quedó. No estaba sucio, pero faltaba. En pleno verano volvíamos a dormir la siesta y el cuarto sin hacer pasaban después de las 15 hs. Pero volvería

title: Hotel
text: Hotel antigo, com carpete. Fica próximo a times square, rockfeller center e a poucas quadras do Central Park. Tem supermercado, restaurantes e bares perto. Bom atendimento. Tem cozinha no quarto. Devido a localização é um pouco barulhento, mas não me incomodou. O que não gostei é que o vazo do banheiro nao estava limpo. Pude fazer o check-in mais cedo e o check-out mais tarde, o que foi otimo.

title: Serviced apartment just off Time Square!
text:
I have spent 5 nights here in a fantastic daily serviced apartment. Central location - 1 min to to Time Square & many theaters.
Apartments are old & dated but exceptionally maintained. Noisy at night due to street noise but where isn't in New York! All staff we encountered were friendly, helpful & accommodating. 
Having an apartment meant we could cook breakfast daily & there are coin operated washing machines available daily after 9pm  which was a nice home comfort seeing as we've been traveling for a month.

title: Quaint and surprising in excellent location
text:
So close to everything in NYC. Subway 100 meters away. Times Square very close (if you can handle the crowds!).Excellent base from which to visit any location on Manhattan and  beyond.
Nice one bedroom apartment was more than adequate though not overly spacious.
Good kitchen, sitting room, nice bathroom. Bedroom was a good size with plenty of storage.
We were there for ten days and would definitely stay here again.

title: Pro e contro, nel complesso buono.
text: Abbiamo soggiornato 1 settimana in 4 (2 adulti e 2 bambini). Partiamo dai pro... Posizione davvero ottima. Forse la migliore... a 2 passi da times square e fermata metropolitana. Cucinino funzionale fornito di frigo e microonde. Wifi gratuito. Massima cortesia della reception (check out alle 11 ma avendo il volo la sera alle 22 l'hanno prolungato di iniziativa alle 13). Su richiesta ci hanno chiamato un loro 'taxi' convenzionato x l'aeroporto pagato 70 dollari rispetto agli 80 di un taxi ordinario). Bella e grande tv sia nel salotto che in camera. Ombrellini a disposizione in caso di pioggia. Bellissima visuale dal nono piano. Passiamo ai contro.... odore non sempre gradevole nei corridoi, bagno davvero piccolo (seduti sul water non si riusciva ad aprire la porta e con 2 bimbi.... insomma.... complicato). Camera senza armadio ma solo una cassettiera con un piccolo appendiabiti. Nel complesso struttura da consigliare per rapporto qualità prezzo. Ma soprattutto la comodità e l'ottima posizione della struttura. La consiglierei e ci tornerei volentieri.

title: EXCELLENT!
text: We just returned from our 2nd stay at Radio City Apts.---This hotel is wonderful.  The rooms are clean, spacious, great location to transportation---and great price.  We needed maintenance for a minor issue and it was taken care of quickly and efficiently.  I will ALWAYS check here first for reservations if I am blessed with another trip to NYC.  I have stayed at a few other hotels in NY and will say Radio City Apt. have them all beat!

title: Like coming home!
text: I just returned from an annual stay at Radio City Apartments with my friends . We were greeted with a "Welcome back!" from the front desk workers. It truly is my favorite place to stay. The accommodations are very nice and a perfect gathering place for us. It feels safe and secure, has a great location, and a friendly staff. Pasta Lovers is a wonderful neighborhood restaurant right next door and a perfect place to meet for drinks or dinner. I can't wait to return next year!

title: Good location, walking distance from many places
text:
This winter vacation started two days after the NY snow storm in March. 
Radio City apartments is easy to reach, although the closest underground does not take you directly to the JFK airport. Due to the weather our apartment was cold, but they brought us an electric heater and it solved the problem. Only the bathroom was still quite cold.
Kitchen is sufficiently equipped with a large refridgerator. You will do the dishes yourself. You can notice when and what other guests were cooking. 
About sleeping quality: View to the back yard was not much but the rooms were quiet so it depends what you value. The street side will be noisy.Weird mattress which felt like “melting” and make a “pit” under you. For a restless sleeper this mattress may be a slight problem. 
Rooms (2) were spacious, bathroom was small, the shower drain needs some improvement. 
One quite irritating thing with many USA hotels is that they will hold your reservation authorisation AND they will also charge your credit card with the actual amount, so my credit card was charged twice until the reservation authorization was released. This took approx. 2-3 weeks. This may cause your credit limit to exceed and no good things will follow when that happens.

title: Perfect Location
text: Stayed here for 5 nights with 3 children. Is literally around the corner from Times Square. Really close to hop on hop off bus tours, Broadway and all that Manhattan has to offer. Is slightly older with a quaint charm about it. No restaurant but close to plenty of shops.

title: Hen weekend
text: We stayed at the radio city apartments for my hen weekend. The location is amazing and perfect as just around corner from Times Square and 10min walk to Central Park and surrounding areas. The apartment itself was a good size - living room with sofa, dining table and small kitchen area, then a double in one room and two doubles in second room and good sized bathroom. It is very dated and old fashioned furniture but great size. If you are exploring New York you don't spend much time in your room - so for us location was great and was just a place to lay our heads. Great price, would definitely stay again when in the city.

title: Excellent location and sleep comfort
text:
Stayed for 4 nights around Memorial Day, and was happy to find that both location and sleep comfort were as good as the reviewers on Tripadvisor said it would be. Our room was clean and ok in size. We struggled somewhat to find out how the lock worked, and whenever the AC was off the room smelled a bit from the pasta restaurant down below (our window faced the back alley), but otherwise it was excellent. 

The concierge was very helpful and we also had help storing our luggage on our last day in New York. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

title: Hotel med god beliggenhed
text:
Hotellet ligger centralt. Er nemt at komme til med metro eller bus.
Ikke langt til Central Park. Tæt på 7. avenue.
OK værelser, som var pæne og rene.
Venligt personale som var hjælpsomme.
Vi vil gerne bo her en anden gang

title: Convenient location for a quick weekend trip.
text: Hotel is within walking distance to museums, Times Square, Grand Central Station, shopping etc... The subway is a block away for anything further.  Nothing fancy in this older hotel. Our small room had a fridge, stove, sink and microwave.

title: Pegadito a Times Square, muy cómodo
text: Es un edificio de apartamentos, con servicio de limpieza, están bien, un poco viejillos, pero suciente para pasarte una semana en Nueva York. Limpios, las camas muy cómodas y el sofacama también. La cocina muy pequeña, se ve que gente no la usa mucho, me da que compran la comida en la calle y se la llevan al apartamento. Lo mejor, si vas la primera vez y quieres ver Manhattan, es la zona ideal, justo en la mitad, usamos muy poco transporte público, nos movíamos bien andando. Hay varias paradas de metro muy cerca, también un super muy bueno, y bares para tomarte una cerveza por las tardes. Lo peor, el aire acondicionado hacía un ruido muy molesto, pero lo dejábamos puesto durante el día y por la noche no lo necesitábamos. Recomendable, sí, por supuesto.

title: Return visit
text: We stayed here about 5 years ago and returned mainly because of the location to Times Square, Broadway theatres and the subway. The place has been renovated since we came last and the desk in manned 24/7. Full kitchen in a one bedroom apartment, the bathroom is tiny and sometimes there are water pressure issues but still a great place to stay. The staff are great,  lent us umbrellas on a rainy morning and kept up the supply of sweets on the front desk! The washing machine and dryer is in the basement and you share with the maids but the wash cycle is only 32 minutes and $1.75. Lots of cheap eats around and the supermarket is on the corner of 49th and 8th.

title: Super recomendable
text:
Excelente ubicación. Cerca de varias líneas de subte. La habitación era nueva en perfecto estado al igual que la limpieza. Contaba con caja de seguridad y aire acondicionado en la habitación. El personal era agradable y saben español. 
Estuvimos en el piso 9 y no se escuchan los ruidos de la calle. Tenerlo en cuenta a la hora de reservar ya que está ubicado en pleno Manhattan, a pocas cuadras de Times Sq.

title: Excelente  ubicaciòn para discrutar de New  York
text: Inmejorable ubicaciòn, departamentos amplios y confortables , atenciòn y limpieza correctas, muy recomendable el restaurant italiano anexo. LA mayoria del personal habla español o al menos lo entiende

title: Viejo pero bueno
text: Es un hotel viejo, lo cual tiene pros y contras. Lo bueno es que por ser NYC las habitaciones son grandes y espaciosas. Lo malo es que el ascensor demoraba mucho! El aire acondicionado era uno de ventana un poco ruidoso y no hay doble vidrio. La ubicacion es excelente y la atencion muy buena tambien.

title: Para recomendar
text: Nos alojamos 2 adultos y 2 adolescentes en una habitación con dos camas grandes y un estar con cocina completa. Excelente para preparar los desayunos y las cenas, calentábamos comida comprada en un supermercado situado dos cuadras. La ubicación inmejorable, a dos cuadras de Times Square, con estación de metro en la esquina y posibilidad de ir a pie a la mayoría de las atracciones clásicas (Quinta Avenida, Central Park, Empire State, Rockefeller Center a una cuadra). El ruido y la agitación propios de la zona no nos molestaron en absoluto. Tampoco había olor a comida como leí en algunos comentarios. Muy cómodo el apartamento, la limpieza buena y correcta la atención en el front desk, todo el personal con el que nos tocó interactuar hablaba en español. La cocina es un plus, ya que salir a comer es caro y a la noche generalmente se está tan cansado de caminar todo el día que quedan pocas ganas de ir a comer a otro lado. La  vajilla es escueta pero alcanza perfectamente para lo mínimo, tampoco pensaba ir a cocinar demasiado en Nueva York. En resumen volvería a alojarme allí y lo recomendaría a otros viajeros.

title: Excelente ubicación!!!
text:
Está cerca de todo y con accesos cercanos a los medios de transporte públicos! Buena predisposición y atención en el Front Desk. Estuvimos en un comodo apartamento con capacidad para 3 personas. Baños amplios y con todo lo necesario. Limpieza razonable!
Para recomendar!

title: Excelente ubicación
text: Apartamentos amplios, con todas las comodidades, limpios y muy prolijos. La ubicación inmejorable, en el corazón de Nueva York. La mayoría del personal habla español, muy atentos y siempre dispuestos a solucionar algún problema. Sin dudarlo volvería!

title: Muy bueno y muy bien ubicadi
text: El departamento es para 3 personas. Cómodo!!! De todos modos para aprovechar NY salíamos a las 7 de la mañana y regresábamos tarde. Está en pleno Times Square, a 2 cuadras de la 5ta. Av. y en la esquina te encuentras con el Rockefeller Center. Mejor ubicación imposible!!! La limpieza es muy buena, cambian la ropa de baño todos los días. El personal habla español y es sumamente atento. Volveremos!!! Muchas gracias , Radio City Apartements.

title: Localização e praticidade
text: O Local é simples, com quartos amplos, limpos e muito perto de tudo. Já me hospedei algumas vezes e nunca me arrependi. Para viagem em família o hotel é perfeito, com toda estrutura no quarto para refeições leves, sem contas que, há um restaurante no terreno, chamado Pasta Lovers em que a comida muito boa e perfeito para alimentar corpos cansados de um dia de passeios.

title: New York tur
text: Hotellet ligger fantastisk plassert.  Fine leiligheter som har det en trenger. Eneste trekk er at det begynner å bli litt slitent. Men pris og beliggenhet oppveier alt dette. Frokost tror jeg ikke det var men alt finnes tett utenfor.

title: Good hotel.
text: The room itself was ok, the hotel is old. The rooms were okay clean. However, it is a good deal for the fact that you get a kitchenette with a good microwave and oven. The fridge is small but it works. All at a good price. For these reasons I would stay here again. It's also in a great location.

title: Amazing! Such a great deal.
text:
This was my first stay here, and will not be my last! This isn't a trendy or swanky hotel, but it's spacious, spotless, and a stone's throw away from Times Square. The best value in NYC!

Thank you to the kind and gracious staff for a wonderful trip. Can't wait 'til next time.

title: superb location
text: stayed for 4 nights, 2 bed apartment.  Warm, clean and comfortable, kitchenette was pretty well equipped, tea and coffee were provided.  Bathroom with shower over bath which was actually very good! The apartments are slightly dated but the location is spot on, right in the heart of the city. The lifts were slow so depending on which floor/how fit you are the stairs were a better option at busy times, this was our 3rd time in NYC and would definitely stay here again

title: Muy bueno!
text: Aparts muy bien ubicados. Relación precio calidad muy buena. La limpieza es aceptable. Sin dudas lo mejor es la ubicación cerca de los principales metros, de central park, time square, quinta avenida. Sin dudas volvería a ir.

title: MUY BUENO
text: Fuimos en familia, matrimonio y 3 hijos adolescentes , nos alojamos alli 2 veces, la 1°  vez, a principio de Marzo, nos toco un apartemento del 5° piso muy comodo, que seguramente es la parte mas vieja del hotel pero bien reacondicionado. Su ubicacion era al contrafrente , bien luminoso, generosa cocina, completa, muy buen baño y 2 habitaciones amplias, buen colchon en la matrimonial y regular los de las camas individuales de la otra habitacion. Un detalle , la 5° cama es el sofa del living que no es practico ya que debes armar y desarmar cada dia. Ademas, no es buen colchon. En la 2° estadia ( a fines de Marzo) nos alojaron en el piso 12" y esta es la parte mas nueva del hotel, la diferencia es considerable. Incluso en la habitaciones , ya que la de los chicos tenia 1 cama de 2 plazas y single, por lo que aca durmieron mejor. Cocina , living y baño muy espaciosos. La limpieza del hotel muy buena. La predisposicion de los conserjes y administrativos tambien en casi todos, siempre alguno es mas antipatico, pero atendieron nuestras necesidades. Casi todos hablan español. La ubicacion del hotel, excelente, a la vuelta de Time Square, y el precio razonable para su ubicacion y prestaciones. Sin dudarlo, volveria. Y lo recomiendo.

title: Muy buen servicio
text: Muy bien ubicado. Muy atento todo su personal. Muy buenas las habitaciones. Estuvimos en un departamento con 2 habitaciones. Altamente recomendable. Cerca de todo. Hay un supermercado a una cuadra y la estación de subte en la esquina.

title: Great location
text: This hotel is great for being right down in Time Square! Loved the kitchenette and large sitting area. Front desk was always very helpful. Only negatives were the beds could definitely have been softer and bathroom was small. Would stay here again

title: perfect stop
text: Rooms are small but have a small kitchen area with refrigerator and stove/microwave; great location for Broadway shows; we saw 4 Broadway shows during our 72 hour stay; nice breakfast/pizza store next to apartments and a pasta restaurant on the other side; reasonably priced and subway entrances near by; we will return again for another theater trip.

title: Great!
text:
Came for 4 days at end of a 2 week break. Apartment with 1 bed..2 doubles.
Staff cleaned every day and replenished tea/coffee daily. 2 blocks to a convenient but close to everything and was easy to get to. Noisy in back rooms as building going on outside but showers etc good. Toiletries good..
Would be good with a toaster.

title: EXCELENTE
text: Excelente atención del personal, siempre hay alguien en recepción que habla español y con muy buena predisposición , servicios generales del hotel de excelente calidad, La ubicación es inmejorable.- En el corazón de la ciudad.

title: Sencillo y muy bien ubicado
text:
Los departamentos son pequeños pero suficiente. Las camas son cómodas. La atención es muy buena. Todos hablan español y estan siempre muy bien dispuestos.
La cocina está muy bien armada como para poder comer algo rápido a la noche, cuando uno regresa cansado del recorrido del día, tiene microondas y horno con anafe, también cuenta con una heladera grande, lo que nos permitía aprovisionarnos para el desayuno. 
Lo mejor, sin dudas, es la ubicación que queda a un paso de todo.

title: Ideal Hotel for Holiday
text: We spent 11 days in New York and thoroughly enjoyed the Radio City Apartments.  They were very cosy, very clean, very central to shops, restaurants and the subway.  The staff were very helpful.  The rooms were quite large and we had plenty of room. We would not hesitate to recommend these apartments and would definitely stay here again.

title: super bien situé
text:
idéalement bien placé en plein times square 12ème étage heureusement car très bruyant la nuit( mal insonorisé ) bruit de l'extérieur, police, ambulance et personne ivre.

Sinon la chambre par elle même impec, nous étions 4 personnes thé- café -frigo- micro onde - gazinière pour faire des pâtes pour dépanner toujours appréciable 2 tv une dans la chambre l'autre dans la pièce principale SDB correct .
accueil nickel avec service de sécurité a l'entrée jour et nuit très bien nous en sommes content très bon rapport qualité prix faut pas oublié que vous êtes en plein coeur de times square.

title: Perfect location and decent price
text:
This was a perfect location for a tourist who had never been to New York City before. I was near Times Square, the Museums, Radio City, Central Park and Broadway. As I was staying for nearly two weeks, having an apartment was perfect as it meant that I was able to have breakfast and some lunch and dinner there without having to eat out every night. It was also convenient for taking leftovers home. Having a stove, microwave and fridge was great as I could make most basic dishes.

The room itself was spacious, the bathroom was very clean. The room I was staying in was noisy at times, not just from traffic, but noise from other rooms (I think) travelled up air vents. The bed was slightly uncomfortable, with a very thin mattress, so if you have a bad back, I would rethink this place. Otherwise, the location overrides any negatives.

title: Apartahotel limpio, sencillo y en lugar envidiable
text:
El apartamento en el que estuvimos es sencillo pero tenía lo imprescindible. Aunque no dispone de armario, sino de barras con perchas para colgar en abierto, dispone de bastantes cajones, lo que facilita deshacer las maletas y tener todo más o menos cómodamente.
El frigo del apartamento era de los pequeños, y aunque fue una desilusión ya que todas las fotos de la web tenían frigo grande, puesto que no cocinamos y solo compramos frutas, yogures, leche, quesos y mermelada, fue suficiente para nosotros.
Los colchones muy cómodos y nuevos. El sofá cama sólo lo utilizamos como sofá, así que no podemos opinar sobre su comodidad como cama. Estuvimos en un apartamento de una habitación con dos camas dobles en la que pueden dormir 4 personas… y la única dificultad sería un solo baño para todos.
El baño es pequeño, pero suficiente. A diario cambian las toallas y ponen más de las que usamos. 
Tiene microondas, cafetera, un cazo, una cazuela y poco más en la cocina. Tiene los platos justos y los cubiertos justos. No es tanto para cocinar como para comer algo hecho que se suba desde la calle  a casa o algo de fruta y ensaladas o solo desayunar. O si se va con niños pequeños, poder calentar algo.
El wifi funcionaba perfectamente.
La atención en recepción, perfecta. Muy agradable todo el personal de cualquiera de los turnos, siempre dispuestos a echar una mano en lo que se requiriera.
La mayoría de los empleados de recepción hablan español, con lo que en cualquier turno encuentras ayuda.
Estuvimos en la novena planta y, con las ventanas cerradas, no llegaba el ruido de la calle. Pero con las ventanas abiertas… era el caos de estar prácticamente en Times Square. 
No vi aparato de aire acondicionado en el apartamento, pero sí vi a personal de mantenimiento con aparatos de aire acondicionado. No sé si los están poniendo, los van a poner o los tienen sólo algunos apartamentos. Pero en el nuestro no había, aunque dada las fechas no hacía falta.
Sin duda, por el precio, dada la situación, es muy recomendable. Aunque no se cocine, el tener el espacio del salón da mucha más comodidad que una simple habitación.

title: Great location!
text: You couldn't beat Radio City Apartments for location! Literally a few steps & you are on Times Square. I think they might have reduced the size of the apartments from my last visit as they seemed a lot smaller but you have everything, bedroom, kitchenette, table chairs, bathroom.

title: Great spot for a Broadway show!
text:
As usual my stay at the Radio City Apartments was great. The food at the  Italian restaurant next door and the sub shop 2 doors down is superb!!!! Also, it was walking distance to the theater to see the production.  The reservation staff is superb.
I look forward to the next trip.

title: Super Hotel
text:
You cannot go wrong booking this hotel, it is so central to everything. 
Times Square, Rockefeller Centre, subway stations, bars and restaurants and supermarkets, its all within 3mins walking distance away.
The staff were excellent always smiling and very polite and ready to lend a helping hand when needed.
We had a very wet day in New York and the staff were handing out umbrellas a nice little touch 😊
We had a two bedroom apartment for 5 of us and there was plenty of room for us all. Rooms quite big and TV 📺 in all rooms. 
The kitchenette was great, lovely to be able to make a bit of breakfast before going off out to explore the city.
Air conditioning was super and shower in bathroom was powerful.
Will definitely stay here again if I am back in New York.

title: Comfortable stay in a wonderful location
text:
We stayed here in April with our 3 children, aged 4, 7 and 9, and we absolutely loved it.
We were impressed with the location, close enough to walk to Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and Central Park.
The apartment was very comfortable, and had everything we needed.
The staff were very friendly, and the Wifi was great.
The Pasta Lovers restaurant next door was beautiful.
The one and only downfall was that they don't accept Travel Cards as payment.

title: Big Apple
text: I have stayed here many times and love it. We usually see several Broadway shows and it is easy walking distance. The accommodations are safe and clean but not fancy. They have free wifi, the rooms keep the light out and they are quiet. There is a full kitchen. The towels are fluffy too. The only downside was that housekeeping never showed up until after 3:00 pm to clean our room. By then we had been out all day and were ready to rest.

title: Muy buen precio y calidad
text: Me aloje con mi hija en el mes de marzo una semana. La pasamos genial. Re bien ubicado, muy buen precio. Tener cocina, heladera, ect. nos vino muy bien, sobre todo cuando estábamos muy cansadas de pasear y podíamos comer algo ahí mismo. También prepararnos el desayuno. cuando necesitábamos algo, enseguida había respuesta de los empleados. super recomendable. Ademas de muy bien ubicado

title: Good place near times square
text:
Very near to Times Square, very clean and spacious which is a bit surprising for the area. It also comes with a small kitchen etc. Overall a nice place for a family or business trips.

Highly recommend to anyone in the area.

title: Great location
text: Very clean apartment, two bedrooms and pullout couch.  Nice kitchenette.  Coffee, toiletries, plenty of linens.  Easy walk to metro.  Greta location to see the city - walk to Times Sq and much more.  Easy check in, efficient staff.

title: Ótima localização
text:
Fiquei num pequeno apartamento (quarto e sala/cozinha), que nós atendeu muito bem (2 casais e 1 bebê, por isso a cozinha era imprescindível). O hotel disponibilizou um berço. A localização é excelente, entre times square e rockefeller center, 10 min (nem isso) caminhando, estávamos no Central Park. 
Tivemos um pequeno problema na chegada, pois minha cunhada havia trocado e-mail com a recepção/gerência sobre a possibilidade de receber uma compra (carrinho de bebê) antes da nossa chegada, e tudo havia ficado acertado. Chegando lá, descobrimos que a encomenda foi devolvida por um dos funcionários da recepção, pois ainda não tínhamos feito o check-in. Esse não cumprimento do acordo fez com que perdêssemos umas algumas horas para comprar um carrinho de bebê. Faz parte, mas aqueles que pretendem receber alguma encomenda antes do check-in, fica o alerta, eles vão devolver. No geral a equipe é muito prestativa, sempre auxiliando nas dúvidas e solicitações. Me hospedaria novamente.

title: Location, Location, Location
text: Stayed here for 5 nights in late April.  Had a double bedded room, kitchenette, clean marble bathroom.  The bed covers acted as blankets, and were not the newest.  The front desk staff was helpful.  Just a few storefronts to the subway stations and Broadway.  We walked to all the four plays that we saw and almost every restaurant we ate at.  Times Square is close by. Sometimes the 2 older, small elevators were very busy and you had to wait.

title: Radio City Apartments - Where the Action Is
text: This is where I stay when I come to NYC. It's location is perfect. When you leave the hotel, you have two choices: Turn right and head for Radio City Music Hall and 5th Ave or turn left and head for Times Square. The rooms are clean. The help is courteous. No long waits for elevators.

title: Good Location for Broadway Shows
text: We stayed here over the Easter long weekend.  I chose the hotel based on reviews and its location.  I honestly don't know how I missed this hotel over the many visits to NYC.  The location is amazing - just down the street from Radio City Music Hall and Rockefeller Center in one direction and Broadway in the other direction.  Lots of restaurants nearby.  The room was typical NYC - small - but it worked well for the 2 of us (we weren't planning on spending much time there anyway).  It was clean and the washroom was modern with great water pressure from the shower.  We had a small fridge and microwave and some dishes and glasses were also provided.  The elevators were a bit slow but it is an older building so no real surprise.  The gentlemen at the front desk were friendly and helpful.  There's a little deli called Toasties a couple of doors down where you can grab breakfast at a very reasonable price.  A "find" in the middle of Manhattan!

title: perfect location for a NYC visit
text: I recently spent six nights at the Radio City Apartments. It is a perfect location with subway stations at each end of the block and is walking distance to Time Square and the Broadway shows.  The beds were comfortable, the room and lobby clean, and the staff very friendly and helpful.  We stayed in one of the studio apartments so had access to a refrigerator, stove, and microwave.  It was a great price for the location and convenience.  I would stay there again on my next visit to NYC.

title: konum çok iyi hizmet kötü
text:
Otelin konumu çok çok iyi, times meydanı yürüyerek 1 dk. 
Ama resepsiyon ve oda servisi berbat, değişsin diye çıkardığınız çarşafları tekrar yatağa seriyorlar!
Banyo temiz, tüm bunlara rağmen fiyat da pek uygun sayılmaz.

title: Radio City Hotels
text: I originally found this hotel online and read many reviews before booking. I found a gem in the middle of midtown Manhattan! The hotel is in a perfect location, close to Broadway, close to Rockefeller Center. Right in the hub of the hustle and bustle. Rooms are large especially in comparison to NY hotels. We sleep five in our room and could have had six easily. Nice living room and kitchenette. Great for those leftovers from the restaurants. Rooms are extra clean, super clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. A great place to stay and very reasonably priced. Highly recommend!

title: 最高の立地でコスパ抜群です
text: タイムズスクエアから直ぐの最高の立地。キッチン付きで手頃な料金。子連れ旅行なので、即決でした。部屋は広くはなく、暗いですし、ホテルのサービスは期待できませんが、刺激的なものが溢れているニューヨークでホテルにいる時間はあまりありません。セントラル・パークで遊んだ後にちょっとホテルで休んだり、タイムズスクエアで買物をして荷物を置きにホテルに帰ったりと、立地の良さが本当に助かります。ブロードウェイのミュージカルが終わって、時間が遅くなっても、劇場を出た5分後にはホテルの部屋に帰れる距離です。思いっきりニューヨークを楽しむなら、オススメのホテルです。同じ建物の一階にあるピザ屋さんも安くて美味いです！

title: Great location, very comfortable and clean plus
text: My grand daughter and I spent 11 wonderful nights in a deluxe suite room on the 12th floor - we were at the back of the building, looking down into a courtyard which made for a very quiet stay. We were there end of March, heating was good, bed comfortable, pillows wonderful. The bathroom marble type finish, good pressure and temperature shower and a great place to rinse out clothes that dried very quickly - there is access to a laundry. The kitchenette just made our stay even better. The Pasta Lovers restaurant that you can access from the foyer, we chose to eat there 3 times as the meals were reasonably priced and delicious. We also had enough at times to go, which made for a light lunch or a small meal after a big day sightseeing. The free Wi-Fi a must when travelling, spacious room - we were able to have our own space and the table and chairs were a good addition. The last time I stayed in New York I stayed at a very expensive 5 star chain - this was just as comfortable, we had more space and everything was an easy walk - 4 blocks to Central Park, 2 blocks Rockefeller Square or Times Square - subway right outside. I will only ever stay here in future, a perfect base. The staff were helpful, the rooms were cleaned to a very high standard every day, everything worked. I have recommended this to friends and family and I know they will not be disappointed.

title: Excellent Location, Friendly, Clean
text:
we LOVED our stay at Radio City Apartments and wished were were there for more than one night. The room was clean with plenty of amenities. They were close to everything - especially the Theatre District where we spent most of our time. We loved getting actual keys for our room - it added to the nostalgia of staying in an old building. Elevators are small and a slow - but we didn't have much baggage so wan't a big deal. We made our deposit in cash - we didn't want them holding funds on our credit/debit cards which was fast and painless - they gave me a receipt and returned the cash at check out. Staff were very friendly and we were able to drop off our bags before our room was ready so we could start exploring. They also offered to hold our bags after we checked out so we could continue to explore after check out time. 

Definitely would stay here again!

title: Great Location & Apartments but 1 staffing issue
text:
I found Radio City Apartments via TripAdvisor and made the reservation through Booking.com as it was the cheapest of all the hotel booking sites. On arrival, I gave the person at the Reception our confirmation Slip for our room. Although the price that they quoted was different, which I knew due to the Daily Taxes hadn't been added on I handed him my Pre-paid Thomas Cooke Credit Card.

Immediately, his demeanour changed from the initial politeness to downright condescending in that "We don't take that type of Credit card here!!". I stated that I was unaware that they did as there was no mention of it on either their website or when I made the booking. I asked if there was an ATM nearby and was told to go back into the street and go down to the end. I had to ask if that meant either left or right in Direction.

I asked him what the total was in cash and he quoted me a total that was $200 dollars over what I had totalled up in head.  When questioned about his total, he seemed annoyed at being challenged and when he added it up by a calculator and realised that his initial total was wrong, there was no apology from him.  After getting the cash and paying for the accommodation, I still felt he had a terrible mannerism about himself.

Any interaction to the Reception was limited when he was on but when the other staff was on, I found them very helpful and courteous.  Despite this, I found both the Apartment to be excellent in both facilities and location.

title: Excellent Apartments in an Excellent Location
text: We spent a couple of nights at Radio City Apartments. We truly enjoyed our stay. We had a PentHouse apartment, which was spacious and clean, with a side view of Times Square. The kitchenette was well equipped with all what is needed to for breakfast or to cook a quick meal. We truly enjoyed our stay, and we will be back

title: Amazing Apartments & Location
text:
I stayed here for 5 days over the St Patricks day festivities in March. Absolutely cracking location, 49th st subway 30 seconds up the road, Rockerfeller Centre 2 minutes away! 

We had a very big room, two queen beds with a little kitchen area and a very spacious bathroom, with a bath! I was very impressed with the size of the room considering the location, NYC is notorious for small hotel rooms. It could easily accommodate 4 people comfortably. 

Clean room, clean bathroom, clean bedding and bathroom... what more could you ask for!

title: Centralt, rent og pænt
text:
Værelserne er forholdsvis små, men der er, hvad der skal være. Det var rart, at vi havde mulighed for at spise egen morgenmad og at der var køleskab, service mv. Rengøringen er helt i top og personalet er venligt og imødekommende. 
Lejlighederne ligger 2 min fra Times Square, så man bor midt i det hele. Vi boede på 7. sal og der var lidt støj fra gaden.

title: Radio City Apartments
text:
Stayed from 30th March - 7th April in a 1 bedroom apartment for 4 people.
The room was clean, comfortable, and was adequate for the time we spent in the room.
It is a great location, the staff were very helpful, and friendly.
It is around the corner from Time Square, close to broadway for shows, close to tourist attractions, easy walking distance to most activities.
Would highly recommend this property as value for money

title: Cheap family apartment
text: The Radio City Apartments are ideally situated in midtown, close to the theatre district and Times Square. They are a bit dated but for the price and location they are well worth considering if you are looking for an apartment. We have young children and cannot stay in hotels as they go to bed early leaving us nowhere to sit and have a drink, so having an apartment is ideal. The apartment we had was a little noisy, but that's New York. As far as price and location go it was ideal.

title: Simple pero correcto
text:
Mi Esposa, mi dos hijas adolescentes y Yo, nos hospedamos la ultima semana de Marzo. La primer impresión es de un edificio viejo y con una decoración austera, pero es funcional y esta muy bien ubicado en el centro de Manhattan.
Las camas son muy cómodas, la ropa de cama es muy buena al igual que la calefacción . 
No tengo nada que reprochar.
El personal de la recepción muy amable y hablan Español.
Tuvimos una Gran Estadia!!!!!

title: Una excelente elección precio/calidad
text:
Nos hospedamos en el departamento de una habitación y creo que fue una excelente elección. El lugar está ubicado estratégicamente a dos cuadras de Time Square y tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía con familia. El departamento tiene una habitación con dos camas dobles y en el comedor/cocina hay un sofá cama que se convierte en otra cama doble. Pueden dormir comodamente 6 personas (4 adultos y 2 chicos). Abajo del edificio hay una pizzería abierta hasta las 23 horas que también vende cosas para desayunar a la mañana. 
Otro dato importante es que el departamento viene con cafetera y te proveen todos los días de café y té, azucar y endulzante. 
La limpieza de la habitación también muy buena.
El baño no tenía bañera pero el agua salía con presión y agua bien caliente. 
La calefacción también muy buena.
Sin dudas volvería a hopedarme en mi próxima visita. Por lo que pude ver tiene un precio igual a otros apart/hotel mucho más alejados.

title: Return visit -excellent
text: Third time here. First time with my 13 year old daughter. Great location, great sleep quality, fab free wifi. Thank you to all of the great lads on reception-they are so helpful and friendly. Can't wait to head back July 17 for another 4 nights

title: Muy buena estadía
text:
Un hotel cerca de todo y con las comodidades necesarias. Al tener cocina te ahorrás el desayunar afuera, el servicio deja te y café. Agregaría una tostadora pero todo se arregla.
Muy buena atención de las personas de Recepción como Carlos y Jaime. No puedo decir lo mismo de Javier que su maltrato era constante. Salvo el, el resto muy amables, simpáticos y predispuestos.
Sin dudas volvería al RadioCity, inmejorable ubicación y cómodo lugar.

title: Fantastic Location - Perfect NY Break
text:
We arrived late evening after long journey from London . On arrival , the Reception desk was manned by 3 very nice concierge gentleman , one kindly lifted up my case up the stairs . Check in was quick and easy …( Remember you have to pay the whole amount plus deposit on arrival ) we were given the keys and off we went in the lift to the third floor . We wasn’t over keen on our room to begin with , it had a terrible loud noise outside the room , so we asked to change rooms . This was done quickly without any fuss and our new room was perfect .
It was like a little one bedroom apartment…. everything we could ask for . Bedroom with two large double beds with TV , lounge with pull out sofa bed with TV and adjoining kitchen . Bathroom with shower/toilet . It was all very clean and comfortable .

The location was ideal …..about 20 minute walk to Central Park and about 10-15 walk to Times Square . Metro entrance just two minute walk away . 

I would certainly recommend Radio City Apartments and would love to stay again some day .

title: Perfect place in the middle of Manhattan.
text:
I never thought that this hotel(apartment) is so close to the Time Square. We stay there during snow storm in March. So the kitchen in the room was so useful since many restaurants were close. There is a supermarket near by so we bought some food and cooked in the  apartment. 
This Apartment is perfect for family. The one bedroom is big enough for 5 people. There was a sofa bed for kids. The room is clean and cozy. 
We really enjoyed  our stay there.

title: Great location
text: We needed a roomy place to spread out after a month on the road. It was perfect! Between Times Sq and Rockefeller Center. Clean, comfortable beds and fully equipped kitchen. Will defiantly stay here again.

title: Ótima localização
text: É a terceira vez que me hospedo neste hotel. Equipe sempre bem educada, e a localização do hotel é excelente. Com cozinha no quarto, cafeteira, geladeira, fogao, etc. Ao lado do hotel tem uma pizzaria super gostosa!!

title: NYE 2016 -2107
text:
The location was perfect for NYE!  Right in the heart of the action.  However, although we were staying here, all our plans for NYE were uptown.  Because the Broadway subway stations were closed for NYE, we had to go way past the desired stop and walk back, petitioning a police officer on each block to let us pass through the throngs waiting to get into Times Square.  
Once inside, there was a spacious suite, plenty big enough for four.  Surprisingly quiet for NYE, especially being so close to Times Sq.  Great access to subways on each side (except that again, subway stations were closed for NYE!)

Would recommend for anytime and for NYE - but only if staying around TImes Square!

title: great location for families
text:
Stayed in a two bedroom apartment , four of us with 2 teenage girls.
The location was perfect close to so many things and safe so the girls could go out on their own at all hours.
Great food options on street level, reasonably priced, with a well stocked supermarket (Bodega) a block away on 8th.
Staff were mostly accommodating and very respectful (a bit more knowledge of the city and things would be really handy)
The room (although small by our standards, and a little outdated) was clean, serviced daily and somewhat quirky which was pleasant to be in at the end of each day . Naturally considering the age of most of Manhattan,the lifts were a little slow and small but that did not concern us in the least   I would find it really stuffy to stay in all day though.
If returning to Manhattan would definitely stay here happily

title: Muy buena estadia
text: Lo mejor del hotel es la ubicacion. En la esquina sta el metro que te lleva a todos lados o tiene muy buena combinacion. A metros de Time Square. Se nota que es un edificio antiguo, pero en muy buen estado para una estadia de 10 dias como la nuestra. No tiene desayuno, pero te dejan cafe, como para prepararte algo caliente antes de salir a la aventura en dias frios como estuvimos. Muy bien equipado. Faltaria una tostadora para mi gusto, pero lo solucionamos adaptandonos a lo que habia.

title: Good Location
text: Radio city apt is very well located near to Times Sq. Tube St is 3 min walk to get down to World trade center, Battery parck ect. Beds made,and fresh towels every day. Only one gripe. Toilet kept blocking, but guys came quickly to unblock. Other than that well worth staying here.

title: Excelente departamento en un muy buen lugar de NY
text: Alquile un apartamento de 1 dormitorio. Excelente estado, impecable, nuevo, muy amplio. Alfombras limpísimas, colchones cómodos, sillón, muebles, cocina impecables y nuevos. Superó mis expectativas. El personal muy amable.

title: Great place
text: Stayed there this past weekend ad it was great.  Great location near everything.  Definitely will stay again.  The people at the desk were very helpful in holding our luggage when we arrived and when we were checking out.

title: muy buena eleccion
text:
fuimos 4 amigos, nos dieron una habitacion que era doble, por un lado tenia dos camas grandes que entramos los cuatro sin problemas con un baño muy completo. Por otro un saloncito con una television muy grande, nevera, y cocina. 
El trato en recepcion muy correcto, la limpieza buena, y los colchones muy buenos.

title: Uma noite voo conexao
text: Nosso orçamento estava curto e queríamos muito conhecer ny, optamos por um voo com escala de 23 horas. Nesse caso é primordial a escolha de um hotel estrategicamente localizado. Colado na times square e na estação de metrô. Atendimento bom, não ótimo. Quarto amplo. Se viajar e tiver mais dias disponível com certeza será minha escolha!

title: Great Location.
text:
The location of this hotel is ideal. It is near Times Square, the Rockefeller Centre and has a Subway station only a minute away.  There are also restaurants nearby.  The Staff are friendly and helpful and the rooms are clean and comfortable and not a bad size by New York standards. 
It was great to have a kitchenette in the room. I stayed in another more expensive hotel in New York and it did not have tea or coffee making facilities.
I stayed as part of a group of over 40 people who were all happy with their stay and would gladly stay here again.

title: Viaje familiar memorable
text:
Excelente hotel,  amplio,  limpio, seguro, familiar. Muy respetuosa y atenta la gente de recepción,  todos hablan español. En la mejor ubicación de New York, a una cuadra de Times Square y frente al Rockefeller Center,  a cuatro cuadras de las mejores tiendas de la 5ª Avenida y Torre Trump. Todo cerca. Muchísimos negocios para comer y a una cuadra de un Supermercado completo.
Recomendable 100%.

title: Great find 2 seconds from Time Square
text: Myself and 21 others stayed at Radio City for 4 nights, was delighted with the location, the room we stayed in was very spacious, the location is amazing two minutes from time square. I am 100 % going to return to New York and will be booking to stay here. Staff lovely .

title: Vacaciones y Half NYC 2017
text: La pasamos muy bien, reservamos un dpto en el cual podrían estar 6 personas muy bien, el mismo estaba muy limpio y bien equipado. La atención de los recepcionistas y sus camareras muy buena. La ubicacion del Radio City Inigualable, a 2 cuadras del Time Square, metro a 30 metros y el precio muy acomododk

title: Paddy's day in NY
text: Great location, could not be more central for the theatre, Times Square, a multitude of other attractions and the subways.  Clean rooms with friendly staff, great towels and a coffee percolator.  While we were travelling as a couple we were with a group of 46 people who all stayed here and had nothing but praise for the place.  Would highly recommend

title: Great place to stay
text: Read tripadvisor reviews. It is a great location and very close to Times Square.  Its easy to find and close to the subway station.  we were on a high up floor and there was minimal street noise and we had a great sleep each night.  The facilities are perfect, 2 double beds in one room, a couch that opens out into a fine bed.  There is a good sensible pc access to print off tickets etc on the 2nd floor.   Good size cooker, fridge freezer and a place to eat.  its very hard to beat.   Staff very good and no nonsense.

title: Location GREAT room a good value
text: In heart of it all. Times Square steps away easy to get to the subway to go uptown or downtown. Rooms clean and large for NY. Staff friendlyish and super competent. Housekeeping way above average. Super value for the $.

title: Great Location and Staff
text: The room was comfortable and roomy (and had a kitchen area with a stove!).  The staff was friendly, and we were within easy walking distance to Times Square and the theatres.  If you arrive too early for check in, the hotel safely checks your luggage so you are not carrying suitcases around the city.

title: perto de tudo!
text: hotel localizado no coração de Manhattan, do lado da Times Square, com metrô na esquina. Quarto completo com geladeira com freezer, microondas, cafeteira. Perfeito para preparar café da manhã ou lanche da noite. Quartos bem limpos e camas bem confortáveis, sem barulho ou cheiros. Equipe bem atenciosa e falando espanhol. Fica a uns 10 - 15 minutos a pé do Central Park. wi-fi funcionando muito bem no quarto.

title: Daughter's 21st birthday celebration
text:
Super cute and spotless apartment, complete with oven (!), fridge, range, and a real teapot! The location was great, especially for the price. Beds and pillows comfy enough. 
That being said, I unwillingly entertained a couple a dudes at the front desk while they watched me struggle with my suitcase getting up the stairs to the building entrance (so rude!). Our room was stiflingly hot all night. The windows do open, which helped. I would recommend.

title: Ubicación ideal
text: Viajamos en diciembre de 2016, pasamos Navidad allá, asi que estabamos bien cerquita de emblemático arbol de Rockefeller Center, cerca de todo en realidad. La ubicacion inmejorable, en pleno times square, a pocas cuadras de central park. Estuvimos en un departamento de 2 dormitorios, muy cómodo, con cocina amplia y completa. El servicio de limpieza diaria y la atencion del personal muy buena. Excelente señal de wifi.

title: Great Hotel---- Great Stay
text: Just returned from a week's stay at this great hotel.  We had a penthouse and I loved that the bedroom was a room to itself.  The room was spacious, clean, had fresh linens every day, efficient kitchenette, firm bed (which I love) and large thick towels.   The remote would not change channels on one of the t.v.'s --- was fixed immediately!  Was it the best views from your hotel windows? no----Was the elevator small and slow--yes----maybe a tired flower arrangement in the room??? BUT, I didn't pay the price for a spectacular view--so what if it takes an extra few seconds in elevator??  I found the staff and room were excellent for the price and can't wait to return again!  Oh, location was great also!

title: Muy mala habitación y suciedad
text:
Nos dieron la habitación del segundo piso que daba contra un basurero, un asco de vista y totalmente sucio para cocinar , no se podía ni tener abierta la ventana porque se metían las ratas, los bichos. Horrible experiencia! Ademas de eso pedimos una cuna para nuestro bebe anticipadamente hicimos el pedido y nunca nos la entregaron. 
La limpieza es solamente cambiar las toallas y hacer las camas, el piso de la cocina nunca lo limpiaron, ni el microondas, heladera nada. No volveria!

title: A wonderful find - great location and excellent value
text: I found this lodging via Tripadvisor.  All those who commented on the great location, sizeable rooms, kitchen facilities and comfortable furniture were telling the truth.  I really appreciated the city walkup appeal of this property.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I cannot say enough about how great a location the was for our family to stay on a three night visit to New York.  Access to Time Square, Broadway Theaters and the "R" train was steps away.

title: Buena Experiencia
text:
Nuevamente en NYC, esta vez en el Radio City. Excelente ubicación, a 4 cuadras del Time Square, está en el 142 West 49th Street, entre 6 y 7… cerca de todo y súper recomendable!

Para destacar, el personal. Realmente muy amables, siempre dispuestos para ayudar en lo que sea. Tanto en recepción como el personal de limpieza y mantenimiento. Hablan español y si es necesario hasta te pueden sugerir alguna actividad para hacer o indicarte lugares a los que uno necesita ir.

Es un apart que tiene su antigüedad, no obstante está muy bien conservado, y cuenta con habitaciones muy amplias y luminosas. Una kichinet que te permite cocinar algo simple ya que cuenta con ollas, sartenes, microondas, heladera etc.

Además, a partir de las 09:00 de la noche, por u$s 1,25 se puede utilizar las máquinas de lavado y secado del apart de manera que te puedes volver a tu casa con toda la ropa limpia!!

title: Great location, lovely room
text: Great location when visiting New York. Rooms are clean and bed is extremely comfortable. Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. It was great value for money and having a kitchen was a plus. Bathroom was spotless and the shower had good pressure.

title: Location, location, location
text: Awesome apartments in the best location of NYC. Close to everything, either at walking distance or with a nearby subway station. I stayed at a penthouse 1 bedroom apartment that was recently renewed and was incredibly comfortable. The only critic I have is regarding the kitchen, that lacks some basic utensils but nothing you can't live without. Highly recommendable!

title: Location, location, location
text: Location of the apartments is just incredible. You are right at Time Square. Subway beside you to bring you where ever else you are looking to visit. I think it was very good value for money. New York is gone very expensive, this is our 5th visit and definitely our most expensive so we were really happy with the accomdation price. The room/ bath/bed all very clean. Bed was very comfortable and the shower had good pressure and lots of hot water. The kitchen was great to have and the coffee provided was nice. We ended up eating breakfast here as we paid 50$ for a basic breakfast for 2  ad and 1 child on the 1st morning, in a diner which I thought was pricey. The staff where pleasant we did not have any major interaction with them just hello and goodbye. They were helpful with bags etc. We had a really nice stay here. We highly recommend it especially if travelling with children.

title: Absolute Gem!!!
text: My wife and I agree this is the absolute perfect location when visiting New York! Everyone and every service is top-notch from check-in to check-out. Rooms are very clean and well maintained. Front desk is very helpful is answering any questions you may have about New York!!!

title: Conforto em boa localização
text: Com peças confortáveis e boa cozinha, este hotel está bem localizado. Há algumas quadras, pode-se encontrar um mercado com tudo o que você vai precisar para a sua estadia. Próximo ao mercado (que não negocia vinhos) pode-se encontrar uma pequena loja que os vende. O pessoal da recepção é atencioso e recebe encomendas da AMAZON, desde que com menos de dois dias da sua chegada. Guardam suas malas. O ponto fraco e o horário do check-in, às 15:00, considerando que o nosso voo chegou às  6:00 AM. Há uma entrada de metrô bem próxima, e é possível ir de metro do JFK até o hotel. Recomedno.

title: Family trip to New York
text: Great location and price/quality was good. No gym. The kitchenware is in good condition but not very good quality. The ventilation unit outside was very loud and would need  maintenance based on the sound. Friendly staff. Garbagemountain outside the entry for two days. Why leave it there?

title: Theater weekend with my daughter
text: If you have traveled extensively, this small hotel will have a familiar european feel for you. Everything is sparkling and clean but somewhat basic.  The room we had was a deluxe studio, with two double beds and a new full kitchen for do-it-yourself snacks and breakfast. I grew up in NYC, so the slower elevator and dated hallways felt very nostaligic, like home.  The staff was friendly and helpful. The location is perfect for a theater weekend.  You are in the center of it all!

title: Excellent location
text: We had a 1 bedroom apartment that had 2 double beds in the bedroom and a sofa bed n the lounge. Useful kitchenette area with fridge freezer, microwave & cooker. Great being able to have a coffee and breakfast before heading out for the day. Location was good for all the city sights, most within walking distance and subway close if you need it. Not 4* luxury but comfy beds and clean. All in all great value and highly recommend.

title: Perdonen la insistencia: la ubicación.
text:
A 200 m. del Rockefeller Center y a 100 m. de la Times Square, la ubicación llega a ser insuperable.
La atención y limpieza, excelentes; y sólo las fotos que publican permiten cuestionarlos. No son reales. A pesar de eso es cómodo y, aunque el edificio es algo antiguo, la relación precio-prestaciones es muy favorable.

title: Kinky Boots & World Trade One
text: Had a great time 😊Pasta Lovers was fabulous - Kinky Boots was fun and very entertaining!  Radio City Apartments were great!  I will definitely stay there again!  World Trade One and the memorial was VERY moving - will need to return for the museum

title: Excelente localização
text: O Radio City tem uma excelente localização. Perto do Rockefeller Center, Metro, Central Park. Éramos 04 pessoas e ficamos muito bem acomodados em um apartamento de quarto e sala com cozinha completa. Foi um excelente custo benefício para Manhattan.

title: Nooooo!!!!!
text:
Sono ancora ospite di questo hotel mentre scrivo la recensione. Premetto che è la sesta volta che vengo a New York, che ho viaggiato molto in tutto il mondo e che non sono una persona abituata agli hotel di lusso... ma non riesco a parlare proprio bene di questo hotel.
Inizio con le uniche due note positive: posizione e Wi-Fi gratuito; ben poca cosa considerato che ce ne sono parecchi in zona di hotel con queste caratteristiche (vedi marriot di fronte bryant park)!
Il primo aspetto negativissimo e' la pulizia!! Mai visto niente del genere! Capelli dentro i cassetti.. fazzoletti per terra accanto al letto...asciugamani in teoria puliti ma in realtà con residui umani sopra! L'abbiamo fatto presente alla reception ma non si sono scusati neanche! Abbiamo chiesto una pulizia più accurata ma sono appena venite a "pulire" la stanza: tutto in tre min(rifatto il letto, passata 10 sec la scopa elettrica e cambiate lenzuola!!!). Non hanno neanche lavato la pentola utilizzata ieri sera nella piccola cucina!
Altro aspetto negativo la camera piccola e vetusta.. mi aspettavo una camera non molto grande e neanche moderna.. ma non un buco così per una deluxe studio (così ci e' stata venduta): siamo in tre con una bimba di due anni e non c'entra ne' il passeggino ne' le due valigie che abbiamo!!!!
Non vi parlo neanche dei rumori che si sentono dalla nostra camera!! Sembra di dormire in strada!!
Per non parlare dei materassi!! Ma sono ad acqua???
Quindi consiglio-se volete un albergo confortevole e pulito- di cercare altrove!!

title: Excelente ubicación, buena relación precio - calidad
text: La ubicación del departamento es ideal. Esta en el corazón de New York. El tamaño del departamento es muy confortable. La atención es muy buena y el personal habla español. Muy recomendable para ir en familia

title: Great location!
text: Having read through many other reviews before our stay, I have the following observations: The elevators are small, but not as small or slow as the reviews led me to believe. Especially not after living in and traveling through a lot of Europe. Yes, our room was warm, but a quick call to the front desk took care of the radiator. And, as they said, "If you don't let us know there is a problem, we can't help you fix it." We did have some trouble figuring out the hot water, but once we did it was plentiful and the refrigerator and microwave were convenient for leftovers. We loved the location. And enjoyed the pizza by the slice place next door. We would definitely stay there again.

title: Close toe erything
text:
We visited NYC on holiday and stayed here, we found the place quite dated but clean. It's winter but we have to contact the front desk to turn the heater on.
I booked here because its was so close to everything. I wouldn't mind staying here again if I'm with my family again.

title: Lights, Camera, Action!
text:
This hotel is in the heart of the bright lights where the people are active and busy. It's not too far from the television networks, like the Today Show, and Rockefeller's Square. It is a good shopping area for souvenirs and other unique stores that give you the edge in furnishings, clothing, music, and good TV tickets.

The room is typical of New York City's hotel rooms, little efficiencies with everything you need, like a refrigerator, stove, dining table, nice bathroom, and shower. The bed spread could be a bit more stylish, but it was nice.

The bellman are just amazing here.

Don't eat at the connected Italian restaurant next door. It's a nice atmosphere, but the pizza tastes like plastic and the pasta dishes need your added remedies. They need a chef who selects better ingredients and seasonings.

~Partee

title: LO MEJOR .... LA UBICACION
text: El lugar es antiguo y bastante descuidado, entraba mucho viento frio por las ventanas porque no cierran bien y no tienen burletes. Estaba bastante sucio porque al ser tan viejo hay cosas que no reciclaron (las alfombras).-

title: Perfect spot in times square
text: Our 2nd time at this hotel. Rooms are clean, plush, comfortable. Bathrooms are modern, with great showers. Walk out side and you are in the center of the restaurant /theater district. They also offer a nice parking arrangement with a lot around the corner, $25 per day. The prices for the rooms are very moderate for such a perfect location in NYC. This is where I will stay when visiting NYC from now on.

title: Excelente ubicacion y departamentos
text:
Excelente ubicacion. Muy cerca de Rockefeller Center, Times Square, teatros, del metro. El apart es muy limpio. La atención es buena, con personal que habla en español. El departamento tenia una habitacion grande con 2 camas, colchones muy comodos. En el living el sillon cama tambien con colchon muy comodo. La cocina tiene horno, microondas, heladera con freezer. Deben poner tostadora porque para tostar pan hay que hacerlo en el horno. Si bien hay muy poca vajilla, esta lo indispensable para calentar alguna comida comprada afuera o hacer un desayuno. En la habitación también hay cafetera con café para hacer y te. Los ascensores son lentos cuando hay mucha gente alojada pero tampoco es un problema. El wifi es gratuito y buena señal. En dias de lluvia tenes paraguas de cortesia. 
En la 49 y la 8 hay un supermercado que esta en el subsuelo, muy completo y buen precio para comprar todo para desayuno o para comer. Es la 2da vez que lo visito y volveria nuevamente.

title: Perfekte Lage - alte Zimmer
text: Die Lage zwischen Rockefeller Center und Times Square ist als Ausgangspunkt für Sightseeing und Shopping sehr gut. Innen sind die Zimmer leider ziemlich alt und klein. Wer nur zum Schlafen ins Hotel geht, ist gut bedient. Ansonsten würde ich eine andere Unterkunft wählen.

title: Great location, great price, great stay!
text:
Family of 4 (mum, dad and 2 teenagers) from Australia stayed for 10 nights at start of January during a cold spell. We stayed in a 2 bedroom apartment (with 2 double beds) with a kitchen and separate lounge room. 

THE ROOM
This is an old hotel so don't expect modern, slick design. It LOOKS a bit dowdy but it's all new inside and our bathroom was brand new. But because it was an old hotel, it had a quirky style with big rooms and high ceilings.Even though we had loads of luggage and 2 big, messy kids, it never felt cramped.

Everything was clean and new -  clean carpets, comfy beds, plenty of towels.
We were on the 11th floor overlooking Times Square. Whilst that sounds great, the immensely huge, bright blinking lights of Times Square were really difficult to shut out - so bring eye masks!

No hotel noise at all but the usual New York sounds could be heard through the old windows (garbage trucks, sirens). Didn't bother us (I mean what do you expect in New York?) but this could bother some people who are used to the double glazed fixed windows of modern hotels.

THE LOCATION
Superb! When you step outside the doors, turn left and then left again and you are in the middle of Times Square. A 2 minute walk. Everyone always says not to stay in TS cause it is too touristy but this is our 3rd time to NY and it was great to stay somewhere central, bustling, safe and always interesting. 

There is a subway station on the corner of the street although it was cheaper for us to Uber everywhere rather than pay 4 subway tickets.

We were a quick walk away from the Rockefeller Centre ( ice skating) and Broadway theatres. Plus a walk to Macys and lots of shops.

WHAT TO EAT
There is a comfortable Italian restaurant attached to the hotel but we found the prices a bit high compared to Australian restaurants (this goes for all food in New York BTW). Instead the desk staff told us about the grocery store 2 blocks away (the Food Emporium) and they had terrific (and cheap!) pre packaged but freshly made food that we were able to bring back to the hotel and microwave. Their pastas were divine! Could also buy things like a roast chicken.

There is a Shake Shack in Times Square (too expensive!), a gorgeous bar called Lillies down the road for adult drinks and pub food, a cheap pizza-by-the-slice place next door to the hotel plus some Asian and Japanese places on the street.  Around the block we discovered the Melt Shop for toasted cheese sandwiches which were filling and a great price.

Sadly we were unable to locate a decent (ie. Australian quality) coffee place in the area. So you are stuck with Starbucks. The best coffee and the one closest to what we get here was in Eataly which is far, far away downtown.

HOTEL SERVICE
Rooms were cleaned every day (new sheets, towels, extra shampoo etc). Staff were lovely and friendly but not many spoke English. So if you needed anything it is best to ask at the desk.

The service desk always had 2 or 3 guys on hand. They weren't friendly, but they weren't unfriendly. But always helpful if asked a question and quick to help with luggage.

Generally the service was super efficient - one day the radiators stopped working. I called the front desk to see if it was something I did or if there was a building problem and they promised to send someone to have a look. As soon as I hung up the phone, someone was at the door with an electric heater! Radiator fixed later that day while we were out.

Another night, to stop a cold draft, I stuffed a pillow against the gaps around the air conditioners. These are old style air conditioners which were propped into the open windows with packing either side so they had some drafts coming through the gaps. When we came back that night all the airconditioners had been removed which allowed us to close the windows properly. Even though this was something I was prepared to live with, I love that they did this because they saw we had an issue.

THE AMENITIES
The lifts are seriously slow and small. And even when they come, you might find you can't fit because there is someone in there with luggage or the staff are hauling rubbish down to the ground floor. It didn't bother us to wait but if you are not a patient person or prone to whining, I suggest you ask for a room on the lower floors so you can walk it.
