Each apartment has a kitchen with a full size fridge, cook top, oven and microwave. Like all US hotels, they have one of those dodgy drip coffee makers with awful tasting coffee. There are utensils, melamine plates and cups, some pots and pans and a limited selection of food preparation items. Not enough to cook a decent meal from scratch with so I wouldn't suggest cooking in the apartment. Also, the staff won't wash up your sink mess so ask for a sponge and dishwashing liquid as soon as you arrive.

WOULD WE STAY AGAIN?
Absolutely! I couldn't imagine staying anywhere else now.

NEGATIVES.
Not many that are worth noting. The only thing was that the bathroom didn't have any shelves or hooks. So there was really nowhere to hang used towels or to put your wetpacks. Even the shower didn't have anything so the shampoos and soaps had to go on the floor. I think they simply forgot to put these things in when they finished the bathroom! A pain in the bum but we could live with it.

title: Great location fab room and central
text: Always stay here when I'm newyork great Hotel room are lovely and clean and kitchen was brand new looking forward to going back already. So close to Times Square fab place reception open 24 hours. Wheelchair access to enter hotel free newspapers and friendly staff

title: Excelente ubicacion
text:
Excelente ubicacion. Cerca de accesos al Metro, Times Square, locales. El apart es muy limpio. La atención es buena, con personal que habla en español. Cuando llegamos nos dieron una habitación muy chiquita y sin mesa para comer luego solicite un cambio y nos mudaron a otra mas espaciosa. Muy bien y muy agradecida.
La cocina tiene horno, microondas, heladera con freezer. Si bien hay muy poca vajilla, esta lo indispensable para calentar alguna comida comprada afuera o hacer un desayuno. En la habitación también hay cafetera con café para hacer y te. 
Viaje con mi hija y la pasamos muy bien en NYC y estuvimos muy cómodas en Radio City sin dudas volverla a ir. 
La única desventaja es que parece que son pocos los ascensores para la cantidad de habitaciones que hay por lo cual siempre tuvimos alguna espera, pero nada significativo (pasa que cuando uno llega cansado luego de todo el día de caminar quiere llegar lo antes posible a la habitacion).

title: within walking distance of most places
text: The location was very good.  It was convenient to Radio City Music hall and it was very easy to get on the subway.   Only reason I did not give a higher rating was because I had a hard time regulating the A/C unit.  It was clean and quiet.  Elevators are a bit slow.

title: cerca de todo a muy buen precio
text: estuve en un apartamento de dos dormitorios, muy comodos con buenas camas, a dos cuadras del Radio City Music Hall, a 1 cuadra del Rockefeller Center, muy cerca de Time Square a dos cuadras de un excelente supermercado(Food Emporium), la vajilla buena, solo que los cuchillos no tenian filo!!. El personal amable y las toallas muy buenas, asi como el papel higienico daban en exceso!!. Sin duda volvere porque esta cerca de todo.

title: Heart of New York
text:
A 2 minutes walk to Times Square, was what we were looking for to spend couple of days in the heart of New York on our drive back from Atlantic city.
Night life was wonderful, crowded and full of excitement. 
The apartment was cosy, clean and comfortable. Service was great!

title: Great location
text: Great location to Times Square, metro lines, restaurants and grocery store. Reasonable price for NY. Would stay again for the location.  Rooms are small (but probably average for NY standards), clean and comfortable.  Room serviced daily which was nice.  Laundry facility wasn fine but you can only do laundry after 9pm as laundry is used by hotel for their linen.

title: Great location
text:
Great place to stay. While rooms were small the facilities are great. The location is very handy to Times Square and Broadway. 24 hour staff. 
We were recommended it by workmates and are really glad we choose it. Well priced for the location 
We would highly recommend

title: Location location location
text: Was a location for access to time square and everything the big apple  has to offer good size rooms and beds for 5 people .The front desk were helpful and friendly and the  entire property was clean and very presentable .

title: Location Location Location!
text:
This is a simple, affordable small room with a kitchenette. No frills but fantastic location central to the subway, Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, 5th Ave, St Patricks Cathedral. Clean and well maintained. 
It was my first visit to NYC but definitely not my last. Had so much fun!

title: No coração de Manhattan
text: Excelentes apartamentos, espaçosos, banheiro muito limpo, cozinha funcional e ótimo atendimento. Todos os apartamentos são carpetados. Sempre antes de você retornar dos passeios seu quarto estará limpo e aromatizado.

title: Un appartement pour 5 avec vu sur times square
text:
Nous sommes à 5 dans l'appartement de cette hôtel
Café à et thé  dispo 
Linge de toilette 
Ménage tout les jours 
L'emplacement est juste génial 
Chambre au 12ème étage (Nous avons demandé en hauteur ) pour limiter le bruit :)
Le personnel très sympa 
Pas grand ça pour cuisiner mais nos amis américain né cuisine e pas de tte manière lol
Bref super rapport qualité-prix

title: Bueno
text: Es unn hotel, comun, muy pero muy bien ubicado. Ademas, tiene de todo. Cocina completa, cama comoda. Tuve un problema pequeño con la calefaccion, pero nada que sea grave. Quiza, sea necesario mejorar el tema de la limpieza de los cuartos, ya que demoran mucho enhacerlos.

title: Central and Friendly
text:
The hotel was clean and well set up.  In the 2 bedroom room the main bedroom was very tight.  The bathroom has no vanity, but is clean and the towels big and fluffy.  
The kitchen well appointed and set up.  
The staff friendly and helpful.  
Great location a short walk to restaurants and subway stations

title: Excelente!!!
text: This is beyond great!!! Esta cerca de todo, el personal es super atento, los apartamentos disponen de una míni cocina que te permite preparar cualquier cosa sin necesidad de gastar fuera. Definitivamente volvería sin pensarlo.

title: Idéalement placé à Midtown
text:
Aparthôtel très bien situé en plein centre de NY, près de Broadway et proche de plusieurs lignes de métro. Nous avions pris un appartement avec 1 chambre (2 bons lits queen size), séjour avec canapé convertible et kitchenette (cuisinière, frigo et micro-ondes). Une petite table permet de manger à 4. 
Il y a un supermarché où on trouve de tout (Food Emporium) à 100 m sur la 49e bien pratique ou un peu plus loin (9e avenue) un Amish Market (très bien mais plus cher). 
L'hôtel en lui-même n'est pas très moderne mais notre chambre (910) a a priori été refaite récemment, donc c'était nickel de ce côté-là. Pour les accros, il y a 2 TV écrans plats (1 dans le séjour et 1 dans la chambre) avec la chaîne HBO (pas de coupure pub). La proximité de Times Square ne génère pas trop de bruit la nuit, à part les sempiternelles sirènes qui résonnent de temps en temps. Mais ça, c'est hélas partout le cas aux US. 
A noter que le ménage est fait tous les jours ce qui n'est pas le cas de tous les aparthotels. 
Cerise sur le gâteau: notre fils étudiant a oublié en partant des documents importants et du multimédia dans une table de nuit. Il ne s'en est aperçu qu'à l'arrivée à Paris ... Nous avons appelé le manager de l'hôtel, qui a retrouvé les biens et nous les a renvoyés (à nos frais quand même). Nous les avons reçus en 48 h, rien ne manquait. Nous avons apprécié.

title: In the heart of it all
text:
If you're looking for a spot right in the center of all the tourist area, this is it.  Rooms are ridiculously large for NYC.  Looks like an old apt building re-purposed as hotel rental rooms.  We stayed in a 1bdr with 3 adults and two kids.  Its was amply large and renovated.  Heating system a bit wonky and we had to open windows to relive the overheating.  Most units dont seem to have A/C so i dont know how a summer stay here would be.  
Radio city music hall and Rockafeller center are a stone throw away and there are subways in every corner of the street.  This place is not glitzy or glammy so dont raise the bar too much.

title: Stretch your NYC budget here
text: You can be in the middle of everything that involves NYC during the holidays and not break the budget. There are so many free sights to see nearby. The room also has a fridge, microwave and stove to keep and reheat the ample leftovers from NYC restaurant meals. (Pizza, soup, bagels and cream cheese, cheese cake, etc)

title: Great Location
text: This place is in a superb location and if your on a budget, a real winner. Clean ans well kept, the apartments have a full size fridge freezer, cooker, micro wave, comes fully serviced with towels and toiletries, as well as washing up liquid, kitchen towel, scourer and dish cloth ! The coffee they supplied was great too ! Maid service everyday, kept the apartment really fresh. Lots of places within easy reach, we walked it from Central Station with our suitcases which took us about 15 minutes. Rovkefeller Centre, Radio City Music Hall,5th Avenue, Central Park, Broadway, Times Square and all the way to 34th street were within walking distance. If your on a budget the Food Emporium just along the road on the corner of 8th avenue is a superb supermarket  Lots of cooked and uncooked food to choose from and the cheesecake is delicious! and right next door to the apartments is the Radio City Pizza shop which is delicious and cheap ! Staff are really friendly too. So dont think twice, you dont spend enough time in the room to find faults as, after all...............its NYC !!!

title: Excelente!
text:
Excelente lugar, excelente ubicación, muy cerca del time square. El personal de recepción muy amable hablan español, muy cerca de los subtes y a pasos del Rockefeller.
Las habitaciones son muy cómodas, el servicio de wi-fi podría mejorar, porque por momentos se corta, pero de igual modo funciona bien. 
Muy recomendable

title: Excelente
text:
Viajamos en familia. Tenemos 3 hijos así que para nosotros es fundamental tener 2 habitaciones y en lo posible algún lugar para cenar
Cumplió con todas nuestras expectativas. 
La ubicación es excelente.  Muy cerca de varias líneas de subtes que para poder conocer esta espectacular ciudad es fundamental
Sin duda volvería

title: Good Hotel!
text: This hotel is located in an amazing location, right behind Times Square and within walking distance to many NYC attractions. The room and bathroom were small but clean and served our purpose. Good place to crash after site-seeing all day.

title: Dec 2016
text: December 2016 had 3 separate rooms , very pleased.  Great location, great staff, very clean.  Older hotel but updated and close proximity to everything including subway and Times Square.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Bom lugar
text: Hotel sem nenhum luxo, mas muito central , apartamentos antigos,mas limpos e com camas confortáveis. Pessoal da recepção oferece um atendimento padrão, sem diferencial, mas bom. Caro como todos em New York, mas preço melhor que a maioria. Voltaria com certeza

title: localisation parfaite
text:
appartement à deux pas de tout
Kitchinette bien équipée
Propreté:rien à  redire
emplacement+++++++++
accueil variable selon le personnel.......
Très positif
Nous reviendrons car cet emplacement est idéal,peu de bruit malgré la proximité des lieux stratégiques,décoration sobre mais efficace.Bien Très bien

title: Great Location for a stay in New York
text:
We stayed in a two bed apartment in the Radio City Apartments in December. It is small, about 12 stories but well located for the sights of New York. The apartment had two decent sized bedrooms,which were clean and tidy with out being overly modern. 
The apartment had a good heating system which made it a bit too hot initially,but we were able to sort that out. Room service is good with new towels supplied each day and beds made and rubbish removed. The staff on the desk were friendly and helpful. Would recommend it for anyone visiting New York.

title: excellent staff
text: Great location, and very hospitable reservations staff (yay Tina)! They truly put the patron first. This is also a wonderful value when trying to visit Times Square around the holidays. The best deal I could find with 2 beds.

title: Nice for the price!
text: Private bath, clean rooms, convenient location a stone's throw away from Radio City Music Hall. Not luxurious at all if that is what you are after, but if you want a basic room I highly recommend this hotel. It also has a nice computer room free to guests. Comfy beds!

title: 2 nights in nyc
text: Delighted. Impressed. So happy. We travelled with 3 kids, 2 of them teens, and were so pleased with the room and amenities. Clean and spacious, my 2 main concerns were completely laid to rest immediately on arrival. We had the 1 bedroom apartment with sofa bed in the lounge, was just right for us with still enough space to move comfortably. And the location on 6th avenue, AWESOME!!!

title: Dejligt hotel med hjælpsomt personale og lige i nærheden af det hele
text: Vi var 4 voksne I en 2 værelses lejlighed. Ikke meget plads, men okay. Rent og pænt. Vi havde problem med ovnen og fik hjælp I løbet af 2 minutter. God service. Hotellet ligger lige ved siden af det meste på Manhattan. Helt fantastisk

title: Great rooms and service!
text: Check in was very organized for our large group. Rooms were updated and very clean. Love all the original railings and stairs. Updates were very well done. Room was spacious and comfortable. Loved the mini kitchen. Restaurants close by were both reasonably priced and very good.

title: Just returned from 4 day 3 night stay at Radio City Apartments.
text:
This is a great older hotel located within walking distance of  Radio City Music Hall, Times Square Rockefeller Center and the Theater District.  Lots of great eating places even right next door.
Staff very accommodating and friendly. I am a Tour Director and had 38 travelers with me.  They all loved the hotel

title: Great Location
text: Small, quaint, very clean, wifi, nice little kitchenette with limited supplies.  Be prepared for NYC traffic noises i.e. honking horns, beeping delivery trucks, & sirens as well as neon lights 24/7, but that's part of the big city experience.  However, the most annoying loud noise is the spitting/rattling sounds of the room radiators! They'll wake you up out of a dead sleep.  Other than that, it was a great stay. Hotel clerks, maintenance crew and maid service were cordial and accommodating. Free NY newspapers. Very convenient location to the Rockafella Center, subway, wonderful restaurants and food vendors. I'd stay here again.

title: Posizione strategica e ottimo rapporto qualità / prezzo
text:
Il Radio City Apartments si trova a poche centinaia di metri da Times Square, in una strada interna piena di ristorantini e pizzerie. Ottimo per girare New York perchè a pochi passi dalla struttura si trova una fermata della metro, e a 10 minuti scarsi a piedi c'è la 5° strada.
I monolocali sono deliziosi, essenziali, vengono puliti ogni giorno. Il personale è presente alla reception 24/7 ed è molto cortese e disponibile ad aiutare il viaggiatore con qualsiasi richiesta gli viene fatta.

title: Excellent
text:
The location is unbeatable, one block away from Times Square but oddly is pretty quiet which is fabulous.  
The apartment building is really old and maybe even a little tired, but this adds to the quaintness inside. Lovely old building.  Studio apartments are plenty big, with full kitchen facilities and good en suites.  The staff could smile more! But they were all efficient and helpful even though they are clearly busy from morning till night. They even allowed us to stow our luggage from 11am till 7pm on our day of departure.  All in all fab and we'd go back in a minute!

title: Hard to Beat
text:
Stayed 1 Night 15-16 November

Cant beat in terms of price in location, 20 second walk from times square. The apartments are very spacious and ideal if there is a gang of friends spending a few nights in NYC for pre drinks or families as there is a kitchenette and living area, massive beds and seperate rooms. A bit of street noise at night but there isnt much anyone can do about that! Definitely would consider staying again!!

title: Fantastic Location
text: Our family of 5 stayed in a studio suite in September and loved it.  Reception staff were great.  Location you can't beat, about 25 metres to the subway, about 2 short blocks to Times Square.  If we ever get to stay in New York again we would definetly stay again.

title: Decent option in an expensive area
text:
I paid $71/night (plus tax and fees) for this three-star Priceline Express Deal property. Studios are clean and functional (nice renovated kitchens) in a pricey area of midtown Manhattan. Check-in fast and efficient, but keys are regular metal keys, so don't lose them. Upon entering, the studio was spotless, including the kitchen and bathroom. There was a little camera hanging off of the TV, which I found very odd. Bed linens smelled and looked clean, but I wasn't a fan of the outdated bedspread, which should be replaced by a white, European-style duvet. 

Housekeeping was good, but abnormally late in the day. I left each day to do some work tasks and returned about 3 or 4 in the afternoon, hoping to be able to relax in a clean room, but the room had yet to be serviced, even when I put the "maid" hanger on the door. I don't blame the housekeepers who are friendly and do a good job, but the hotel management for not hiring enough staff. 

Elevators should really be renovated or replaced. They are very slow and, on the last day as I was trying to leave with my luggage, my elevator went from the ninth to the seventh floor and, on that floor, the door just kept opening and closing, which meant I had to haul my suitcase down seven flights of stairs. Fine for me, but would have been near impossible for a senior citizen or disabled person. 

I was staying here for some consulting work, but location would be especially nice for tourists who want access to a lot of New York's biggest attractions and a multitude of subway lines.

title: Needed a room
text: I was in NYC two weeks ago and had reserved, cancelled and had to reschedule. Not a bad place, clean, location close to Times Square. Great Italian restaurant next to hotel..Only down side is having to have a deposit . Other than that it's a pretty good place. ..

title: Excellent Location and Great Amenities
text: This hotel was perfectly located for our visit to take in a Broadway show.  The room has a kitchenette including a small refrigerator, a stove and sink area.  The restaurant right next door was excellent, and we even got a discount on the parking garage around the corner which was a significant savings.  We highly recommend this place and will likely check for it first for our next NYC trip.

title: Good size apartments, very noisy
text:
Considering it is NYC the apartments are quite a good size, but old and a little dark.  We are a family of four and chose an apartment style hotel so that we could use the kitchen facilities.  Strangely, while we had an oven, stove and saucepans there were no other accessories.  No knives or other cooking utensils. Very hard to use your kitchen without these things!  Staff couldn't help.
The apartment was also very noisy at night.  It is the theatre district and 1 block from Times Square so there is a lot of noise overnight.  A higher floor may have helped, but we were on level 6 and it was very disturbing over night.  Some double glazing would certainly be appreciated.
The location is excellent from a tourist perspective.  Easy walks to the theatres, Times Square, Central Park, Rockefeller Centre. Slightly longer but still good walks to NEw York Public Library, Central Station and the Empire State Building. Subway station on your block.  
Apart from the noise, I would recommend this hotel.

title: To Grandma's House We Go
text:
The best way I can describe your stay at RCA is that it is like staying at your grandmothers house for Christmas. I don't mean this in a bad way, it just that everything is just a little less comfortable than home, the beds are ok but not great, the heating system is a little hard to figure out, the shower takes a day or two to get the temperature right. Its a little dated but not ugly. When you go downstairs in the morning the staff is very friendly and helpful although you don't get a good morning kiss like grandma. 

Overall we liked our stay and the location.    We have 3 kids and a baby and we managed with the 1 bedroom apartment although I would recommend the two bedroom. Anyways, just like grandma's place, when your gone home you miss it.

title: Noisy, no AC, good location if you like to be in the thick of it all.
text: We stayed in room on 10th floor with kitchen. Stove, microwave, kettle and fridge. Basically like a tiny studio apartment. NYC was cold while we were there but there was no AC so we had to have window open all day and night so it was extra noisy and we got bitten by bugs and even at that it was really hot and stuffy in room! Would not stay there in summer or if you need quiet for sleep. That said, it is in good location. 5 mins walk from Times Square and 6th Ave and 10 mins to Central Park. Personally I think there are nicer areas to stay in NYC. Staff were helpful and friendly. Not all bad but for me negatives out way the positives.

title: Ótima localização
text: Hotel antigo, simples, porém extremamente funcional e agradável.  Quarto e sala espaçosos..  A vista não é boa, mas a localização e preço compensam. Ótimo para quem quer ficar próximo ao burburinho da Time Square. Mas, na próxima vez, pretendo ficar no Village, Chelsea ou Upper West Side, bairros com mais personalidade. E nunca mais no verão!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: bit outdated but location is perfect
text: location is just superb however it's a bit outdated. very annoying is the fact to have an air conditioner right opposite of your bed. due to the noise impossible to open a window. basic kitchen incl equipment. like most places in NYC relative small rooms and for quite some dollars

title: Super emplacement
text: Nous avons passé 6 nuits, belle chambre, très propre, bonne literie. Chambre équipée de kitchenette, très pratique pour les repas du soir après une bonne journée de marche, de quoi aussi se faire café ou thé le matin. L'accueil est disponible, mais juste le minimum. Sinon les fenêtres sont pas super isolées, donc on entend bien la vie de la ville...

title: Bom local mas merece melhorar
text: Foi nossa segunda hospedagem. Boa localização, pessoal de recepção e portaria muito gentis mas tem pontos negativos que podem e devem ser melhorados. Começando pela limpeza que deixou a desejar, camas arrumadas e toalhas trocadas sim, mas ficaram migalhas de pão no chão e marcas de uso na pia por varios dias. Os utensilios de cozinha são muito limitados, compramos uma sopa e não tinha concha para servir, não tinha faca e tábua de corte para cortar pão, não tinha taça para tomar vinho. São pequenos detalhes mas fazem a diferença entre o bom e o ótimo. Outro ponto é o nível de ruido, já que NYC é uma cidade muito barulhenta as janelas poderiam ser "sound proof".

title: Great location, great value
text: We prefer to stay in quirky hotels, and this fit the bill! Check in was easy, the room was clean, the linens could have been softer, but the beds were comfortable. Not your run of the mill hotel accommodations but in a location not to be beat. Two negatives: street noise and lights flashing from outside were issues, and during the evening hours, the smells emanating from the restaurant downstairs were intense. Good wifi, no closets, no bathtub, shower was unusual.  All in all, enjoyed our stay. Would stay again.

title: Estadía  en mayo de este año,
text: La ubicación es inmejorable, buena limpieza. La habitación super cómoda. Pudimos  prepararnos comida con lo cual ahorramos. La cocina muy bien equipada, tenía cafetera eléctrica y nos dejaban sobres de café y leche para preparar. El personal muy atento, hablaban en español y nos aconsejaron en distintas inquietudes cada vez que lo necesitamos. Lo aconsejo sin dudar.

title: Super hotel in Midtown
text:
Great location, lovely decor and friendly service.
We had a one bedroom apartment on 12th floor. Slow elevators a bit of a pain but the size of the apartment made up for it. Views on 3 sides (pic shows that from the lounge) large lounge with bed settee, kitchenette, coffee replenished every day. Nice bathroom with toiletries. 2 TVs.
Wifi signal not great being so far away from the server but there is a room with computer and printer so you can check in your flight and print boarding passes.
Room only, no restaurant on site but a lovely pizza place downstairs and two doors down an excellent takeaway for breakfast and lunch.
Would definitely return:)

title: Excellent rapport qualité-prix
text:
Nous avons choisi le Radio City plus pour des raisons pratiques et budgétaires, plutôt que par goût. L'hotel est correct et parfaitement situé ce qui est son gros avantage.
Les chambres sont vétustes, les lits un peu "piscine" et la clim extrèmement bruyante. Mais les chambres sont faites chaque jour et les serviettes sont changées tous les jours.
Bref, on y va pour dormir et profiter de la situation géographique.

title: Ubicación inmejorable
text: Alquilamos un apartamento con dos camas queen y un sofá cama para dos parejas y un niño y estuvimos muy bien. la ubicación es inmejorable, a 2 min de Times Square, Broadway, a 5 min.de Central Park... El apartamento estaba muy bien y teníamos vistas a un trocito de Times Square, a pesar de que el edificio es muy antiguo. En la recepción muy amables también.

title: UBICACIÓN
text: Recomiendo el hotel por su comodidad, su ubicación y la buena atención. Dispone de varias habitaciones, súper completas y muy cómodas. Si bien no ofrece desayuno, hay muchos lugares al rededor donde se puede ir. Sin duda recomiendo para familias.

title: A city break with friends
text:
Myself and four friends have just returned from a stay here. It was an ideal place to stay. It's literally less than 3 minutes from Time Square, close to the Rockefeller centre and St Patrick's cathedral and about 10 minutes from Central Park. The subway on the street where the apartment is links directly to downtown and has a stop for the World Trade Centre. There are shops close by and Irish bars- we found the Celtic Club to be a lovely bar. It has a vibe like the bar in "Cheers" and it served great food upstairs. There is also a fun karoke bar next door where some celebs visit after being on Jimmy Fallon- Radio City is close by so the likes of James Cordon and Lady GaGa were spotted in the Karoke bar while we were there.
The apartment itself I can't fault. There was 5 girls so we had 3 double beds in 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, hall and a kitchen come sitting room. We picked up some bits to have breakfast there every morning. It's very clean and cleaning staff came in every day and left the apartment spotless. I think they realised there was 5 girls and we had a great supply of towels! The guys on the front desk were always welcoming and helpful. It is an old building so the lift isn't really big but we all fitted in with plenty of space. Would i recommend it? Absolutely-  it's bang in the centre of where you want to be and the beds were very comfortable. But when your in New York your not there to stay in the bed all day- but if you are, those beds are amazing! We had Tv's in all the rooms. A gem of a place and I will be back!

title: Très bon séjour !
text:
Visite en famille de New York avec mon conjoint notre fils de 5 ans et ma nièce de 13 ans.
Hôtel très bien situé à 2 pas de Times square et du métro. C est un emplacement idéal. Nous étions dans un appartement avec 2 chambres, rien a dire très propre fonctionnel et cuisine suffisamment équipée pour se préparer des plats simples. Et puis si vous n avez pas envi de faire à manger la pizzeria qui est à côté de l hôtel est très bien. La Deco est un peu vintage mais ça revient à la mode....
Le personnel est sympa mais effectivement ça dépend des équipes mais dans l ensemble c est très bien. 
Le seul point noir de cet hôtel est le prix effectivement très cher surtout pendant les périodes scolaires. Donc un conseil partez hors vacances ou en janvier février qui sont des périodes creuses.... je pense que nous y retournerons car grâce à son emplacement nous avons pu réaliser beaucoup de visites!!! Bon séjour à tous!

title: Muito bom!!!
text: Hotel legal, stafs simpáticos, muito solícitos, quarto bom, chuveiro gostoso!!! Uma única ressalva é quando fomos visitados por uma barata! Corremos p o mercado e compramos um spray mata baratas e praticamente detetizamos o quarto de manhã e só voltamos a tardinha!! Não encontramos mais nenhum inseto!! Voltaria a ficar nele sem problemas!

title: La mejor elección
text: Cuando vamos varios días a alghun destino prefiero alquilar departamentos o apart hotel. Luego de mucho buscar en distintos barrios y tarifas, nos decidimos por el Radio City. Una vez en Nueva York llegamos a la conclusión de que no nos equivocamos... la ubicación es ideal sobre todo para una primera visita a la ciudad;Time Square a dos cuadras, estación de subway en la esquina con 6 líneas distintas; bien equipados los departamentos, con todo lo que se necesita; excelente atención en el mostrador, con personal que habla perfecto español y sabe aconsejar; la limpieza de las habitaciones es impecable... la verdad es que nuestra estadía en el Radio City fue perfecta. Totalmente recomendable.

title: OVERPRICED & OVERALL BAD HOTEL
text: I had a dental surgery done in Manhattan New York and after being duped on a prepaid Harbor Bed and Breakfast, Staten Island and an Airbnb Accomodation, had to book three hotel aaccomodation on a last minute basis Radio City Apartments being one of those.  This hotel is not worth being called a Hotel in the real sense of the word.  It is cramped, old with no lobby and with a screechy, smelly, old and cramped elevator (only one functioning) that takes forever to work.  The people comprising the staff are unfriendly and unaccomodating to say the least.  This 'hotel' should be ticked off the list of Hotels Worth Staying in Manhattan.

title: Très bon emplacement mais notre appartement est vetuste et bruyant
text: Bon emplacements mais les chambres sont trop bruyantes, les lits grincent, la clim et le chauffage font beaucoup de bruit. Il est un peu vétuste. Pas de grille pain, cuisinière à gaz, nous étions 6 dans l'appartement et la salle de bain était vraiment petite

title: Living a dream ...
text:
Even if it was only for 10 days, I loved having my own 'apartment' in mid-town NYC.

The kitchen made it for me. OK - everybody eats out, but just being able to grab things from a deli and take them back 'home' makes a difference: and you can invite someone back for supper.

The elevators were a bit 'quirky'.

The staff were marvellous.

Right between the Rockefeller Center and Times Square.~

I loved the place.

title: Great for big families
text:
My wife and four children really enjoyed our stay in this hotel.  It fit our needs well, and we didn't have to get two rooms which was a worry of ours.   

It was clean, the AC worked and the little kitchen was helpful.  The room was quiet enough, and the door men were helpful with our stroller up and down the stairs. 
It was easy walking to both the Rockefeller center and Times Square.  

Our trek to Little Italy was a bit much, but otherwise nice room.

title: LOCALIZAÇÃO PERFEITA
text: Flat com ambiente familiar, distante uma quadra do Rockefeller Center (para um lado), e meia quadra da Brodway (para o outro lado). Apartamentos com boa estrutura de cama, mesa e banho, além de sala com cozinha americana pequena mas eficiente.

title: Handy Location
text: Stayed in June 2016 for 5 nights - brilliant Location close to Times Square. Older Hotel with standard facilities but was very clean easily accessible after hours. Reasonably priced given the age of the hotel but you are paying for the Location. Would stay again

title: Loved Apartments and Location
text: Lovely clean apartments right in the centre of everything . Small but well equipped with cooker , coffee maker,large fridge/freezer and microwave. Shower very good with plenty of toiletries and Hairdryer. Friendly staff and lovely reception area . I felt really safe staying here and will definitely stay again . Thanks to all the staff for a lovely pleasant staff

title: The area is not so nice
text:
I have stayed several times at Radio City, and always found it very convenient, not luxurious but basically OK and has everything you need, with the convenience of an apartment.
The not good part of our stay back in July 2016 was that there are may vendors on the street, and they "camp" there so is far from nice when you return in the evening to the Hotel, on top of this the sidewalk was on repair. This is why I would probably not be returning next year

title: Right in the heart of it all
text:
This is an old hotel that is in the process of being renovated.  The rooms are small but the hotel is clean, safe, busy and has mini-kitchens in the rooms so you can eat your breakfast in and have snacks and treats at the end of the day when your feet are shot.
There is a good Italian restaurant and bar on one side of the hotel and a pizza/Sandwich shop on the other which makes getting food easy. 
The hotel is 1/2 block from Times Square, close to Broadway, Radio City, NBC Studios and Rockefeller Plaza.  If you are a walker you can see so much without taking tours or riding transit. Probably a good thing if this is your first visit to the City.
The hotel staff are extremely obliging and helpful. Some have worked there for over 30 years and they can tell gentle stories about the street and the hotel.

title: Nice
text:
Located on 49th st and 7th av = exactly on Times Square.
Rooms are clean and equiped with a full kitchen.
The only neggative point is the outside noisy envinronment- the windows are not so good quality and there is some noise from the street (the street is noisy 24 hr).

Tip: This is my first time in nyc. Times Square is only for tourists and despite broadway there is nothing to do in this area. If you want to see real New York stay closer to Penn station

title: An apartment really at Times Square
text: We had four days in a 10th floor apartment facing away from the street which was pleasantly quiet.  Apartment was clean, furniture was good, kitchen well-equipped and guests have access to the laundry after 8pm.  Subway and delis are a short walk away and there is a quite reasonable Italian restaurant next door - handy if it's raining.

title: fantastic location, well appointed apartments, great value and friendly service
text: we were not sure what to expect give previous reviews were good and not so good. Boy were we surprised. Our stay was for a week in a studio apartment. both beds were really comfortable, bathroom on the small side but it is new york and the kitchen had a full fridge, full stove and oven which was great for having a break from eating out all the time. There is a fully stocked grocery store 2 blocks away, times square around the corner, broadway, transport, basically everything. The service was good and the rooms clean and well appointed. overall a really great stay and would stay there again.

title: amazing in the heart of the city
text:
excellent location, spotlessly clean, staff superb and knowledgeable, good value for money, apartments spacious and excellent air conditioning units in all rooms.  This fabulous venue is right in between the "Pasta Lovers" restaurant - review to follow and radio city pizza,- review to follow with Toasties deli, Chinese and Indian restaurant also side by side on the same street .

I have visited NYC before but this is the best place yet to stay, clean towels every day, apartments cleaned every day, free toiletries including mouth wash, I will certainly stay here again on my trip next year, well done keep up the good work.

title: Ótimo hotel, ótima localização!
text:
Do lado da Times Square, do Top of the Rock, do famoso Radio City Music Hall e ainda a meia quadra do metro, este hotel com uma cozinha compacta é muito bom!
É antigo, porém reformado. O quarto tinha tamanho adequado para até 3 pessoas. O banheiro era um pouco apertado, mas não chegava a incomodar.
A cozinha equipada com fogão, já tem alguns utensílios domésticos, como panelas e alguns pratos, sendo muito possível fazer uma sopa ou uma carne se quiser fugir de restaurantes enquanto visita a cidade.
O barulho é inerente à cidade, e fica muito bem isolado com as janelas fechadas.
Adorei o hotel e recomendo muito a hospedagem!

title: Great stay!
text:
Excellent value for money (if that exists in New York) we had a 2 bed apartment booked and it was excellent, well appointed spotlessly clean and appeared to be recently refurbished.  We couldn't fault it.

Communal areas were a little tired but no issue!

Make sure you grab a slice of pizza from next door

title: Apartamento sencillo y muy limpio
text: Está situado en una zona envidiable, a 2 minutos de Times Square. Hay una pizzería debajo y dos restaurantes asiáticos. El supermercado lo tienes a 5 minutos, así que tienes todo tipo de comodidades para hacer tu comida en casa. La limpieza está muy bien. El personal no es muy simpático, pero si tienes cualquier problema te lo resuelven enseguida. La comodidad de las camas es perfecta. Nosotros nos cambiamos de habitación, porque la que daba a la calle era ruidosa, y en la zona del patio era más tranquila.

title: Just as good second time round!
text: I have stayed here previously and suggested it to my cousin and her daughter when we were having a family reunion. We were all most happy with everything. We found all the staff extremely polite and helpful. Yes, they are all male on reception but does that really matter?! The rooms are reasonably well equipped but, hey, who wants to do a lot of cooking in NYC? I have recommended this place to a few friends who, like me, we're happy to stay here. You couldn't get a more central location and the price charged is extremely reasonable. Far better than shelling out thousands for a hotel. After all, not much time is spent indoors in this city that never sleeps. Will definitely return

title: Excellent apartments
text: Five girlfriends stayed for 1 week we booked a 2 bedroom apt for the week we expected one double bed in each bedroom & were going to use the pull out couch bed but to our surprise there was 2 double beds in one of the rooms.Beds were extremely comfortable as were the pillows.Fresh fluffy towels each day + apt cleaned.Staff extremely welcoming & helpful throughout the hotel especially the front desk. Times square less then 2 mins walk + subway,central to everything you need food ,sites ,& of course the excellent shopping.Would recommend booking an apartment on a higher floor as don't forget your staying in a city that never sleeps so expect noise at all times.All 5 of us ladies aged between late 30's to early 50's would recommend this hotel & we definitely will return.Lift small & slow my only downfall on this well run establiment.

title: Per-fec-to
text: Como puse en el titulo, este lugar lo tiene todo, buenos precios, buena ubicacion, y sobre todo limpieza y seguridad. Sabemos que Nueva York es una gran ciudad y noes un pueblo por lo que la seguridad es importante. Al ser apartamentos, tenes todo para cocinarse uno mismo, igual apenas pisas la calle tenes lo qu quieras, estas a dos cuadras literal del times square. Cuando fui con mi familia en cualquier momento que estabamos en el hotel salíamos a caminar y terminabamos en el times square a cualquier hora, es hermoso, recomendable al 100%

title: Really Good NY Option
text:
We had a one bedroom apartment. I believe they are all different and have different outlooks, our outlook was unpleasant and there were cooking/fat smells coming up from the restaurant below but who spends much time in their room when in  NYC?! 
I've included some pics, we did some cooking in our rooms, there are plenty of choices for take out, dine-in or street vendors right out the front door. 
The reception staff were all male and were the unfriendliest staff I've met in 2 months of travelling all over the States. 
The laundry situation is a weird one, you use the hotels commercial laundry but only late at night, with the assistance of staff (ESL)
It's all about the location at this place and we loved it.

title: Increiblemente bueno
text:
Estuve del 12 al 19 de septiembre de 2016, me aloje en el piso 10, un apartamento muy lindo y grande, muy pero muy comodo ( Apartamento 1110), totalmente equipado, con vista lateral a pulmon de manzana, lo que nos permitia ver todas las noches las hermosas torres iluminadas de H&M y del Empire State.
Los empleados todos muy agradables y serviciales, hablan perfectamente el español y colaboran con el huesped.
El servicio de mucamas muy bueno. 
El edificio de un estilo muy neoyorkino y de 1904, una belleza.
Totalmente recomendable.

title: The worth service
text:
We booked online using the hotels website for a weekend and after a long road trip we finally made it to the hotel and when we walked in the receptionist told us there is no booking and we stand there for an hour trying to show him that we have an email booking approval from their part  and after talking and trying to convince him he gave us a temporary room for one night with a sofa bed which I would call it a suffering bed we couldn't sleep all night actually it's not worth the money value showing online and the service sucks .

I wouldn't recommend it @ all

title: Best value for a group of 6!
text: We rented 2 rooms for 6 people. One was a studio and the other one was a 1 bedroom suite I think. Was very close to everything including Times Square. Close to all the restaurants and major attractions. Good value overall and nice place to stay for a short stay in Manhattan

title: NOUS IRONS AILLEURS
text:
L'emplacement ne justifie pas tout. Même s'il est très bien situé, cet hotel qui ne serait facturé que 50 ou 60 euros en France l'est tout de même à 300 dollars la nuit. Rien d'un studio " DE LUXE" mais une simple chambre avec un coin cuisine mais paradoxalement sans table ni chaise, aucun endroit pour pouvoir manger ou pouvoir écrire. Une penderie en plein air avec quelques cintres, une climatisation avec un soufflerie insupportable. La salle de bain est petite et sans possibilité de ranger nos affaires de toilette, sinon au sol. Le tout aurait besoin d'un net rafraîchissement.
L'accueil est variable en fonction des équipes, mais dans l'ensemble satisfaisant, sinon la wifi (gratuite) est performante et les chambres, propres, sont faites tous les jours.
Nous retournerons à NEW YORK, c'est certain, mais dans un autre hotel.

title: Great Location
text: We stayed in this hotel with our two children.  Loved the location as it was very close to everything.  Our room was a studio apartment with a full bathroom attached.  The price was excellent.  An older hotel but has all the comforts you would be looking for.

title: Visit
text: Location is spot on, near to everything. There is an awesome take away pizza next door as well. The staff are great and always kind and professional, the room is basic but if you just need a base and somewhere to lay your head this is your place. I would stay here again

title: Otimo apart
text: Sistema aparthotel com localização excelente, muito confortável, antigo mas bem conservado, uma pequena cozinha equipada com fogão, microondas, geladeira, e cafeteira. Na cozinha faltam aslguns itens como travessa ou assadeira para ir ao forno e uma travessa para servir ( salada ou qualquer outro prato ) escorredor de macarrão. porém são coisas simples que conseguimos nos virar sem elas. atendimento bom e bilingue ( ingles e espanhol ).

title: No frill, great location place
text: just back from week long stay in radio city apts. Definetly a no frills accommodation, but fully serviceable, and functional, We had a two bed apt,and it was plenty big for us 5 guests. Fine size bed rooms and bathroom, living area a little tight, esp if you're using the pull out sofa bed. There's a lot of space allowed for hallway which could probably have been put to better use, mainly storage! Only a small rail with few hangers in each bedroom, so if you're staying like us, a week or longer, or have children, storage is very tight. Cleaning staff were excellent, in every day replacing towels etc. Full size fridge and cooker in apt,plus microwave and sink. We were on the 9th floor so didnt hear much noise at all, and we had the air con going day and night! Hotel provides free safe facility, which is excellent service. I would return and stay here again.

title: Ottima posizione e staff gentilissimo
text: Ho soggiornato con la mia famiglia i primi di settembre,l'appartamento era pulitissimo e la posizione era ottima poiché ad appena due passi vi è la fermata della metro e time squarcio. Anche il personale è stato a disposizione di ogni esigenza!

title: Ótimo Hotel
text: Ficamos hospedados em Dezembro/15, hotel muito bom, do lado da Times Square. Parece até um flat. Passamos a virada do Ano Novo, por ser final de ano achei que iria pagar um absurdo, mas não tarifa satisfatória, muito bom!

title: Great location but....  NOISY!
text:
Great location.   'Apartment' is a stretch of the definition of apartment :-)

24 hour lobby & attentive service 
We were in room 309.  Queen. Small room. Has a queen size bed, very comfortable, nice bed clothing & pillows.

Very clean room. Table &  2 chairs, microwave, cups, plates  cutlery for 2 , percolator & coffee supplies. Air conditioned & hair dryer. 
Ironing board and iron. Compact & everything works.

Small ensuite. Very functional, compact and contained. Plenty of bathing linen supplied. 

Room serviced daily. 

For location - we thought this reasonable value.

The downside is ....it is noisy. The loudest noise came from the  air conditioning from adjacent rooms (we turned ours off at night - didn't really need it and it was quieter. it cooled  the room quickly when turned on).  Some street noise.

Ear plugs helped! There may be other quieter rooms.

title: Excelente
text:
me hospede con mi familia en Septiembre de 2015, en una de las para 5 personas
muy cómoda, excelente ubicación, el personal muy cordial y siempre dispuestos a ayudarte en tu estadías.
la habitación son muy amplias y cómodas. las camas están en excelente estado,
a pesar de encontrase en una zona céntrica, las habitaciones son silenciosas.
la ubicación es inmejorable, a cuadras de time square, muy cerca de los subtes y a una cuadra del top of the rock

100% recomendable

title: Интересный опыт
text: Отель располагается в самом сердце Манхеттена. Налево Таймс сквер, направо студия NBC и Рокфеллер центр, в историческом здании. Это и плюс и минус. Плюс в том, что сохранились старые интерьеры лестницы и холла, паровое отопление в чугунных батареях, в общем, аутентично. А минусы в том, что отель уже нуждается в реновации. Номера давольно маленькие, мебель потертая, кухня условная) Но это все компенсируется прекрасным расположением.

title: Good place and location
text: Went for 3 days. Building is in an excellent location, close to everything, specially time square and Broadway.  There is a restaurant in the same building with very good food a little e pensive but food was good.

title: Decent, affordable stay, but that's it
text: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a weekend because it was an affordable option over a long holiday weekend.  Everything was moderately maintained, although there were bags of trash sitting in the hallway.  The lights on the elevator didn't always work, so we'd never know if the elevator was coming or not.  When we reported this to the staff, they seemed unconcerned.  This hotel is a converted apartment building (hence the name), so the quality of the hotel is essentially just an apartment building once you leave the lobby.  Our bed was pretty hard and squeaked really loudly at the slightest movement.

title: Excelente ubicacion
text:
Un apartamento completo para dos personas con cocina, no nos falto nada!
habitacion amplia, muy comoda. 
Muy buen servicio de recepcion y limpieza.
Abierto las 24 horas.
Orientacion para paseos turisticos en lengua hispana.

title: Es  como sentirse en cada
text:
Siempre me sorprende  porque  fui varias veces y  cada cuarto que  me hospedo es mejor al anterior.-
Los cuartos son agradables  porque tienen todo para desayunar  y comer. El personal que atiende es  muy bueno y permite dejar las valijas en deposito luego del check out.  Fui varias veces y n dudo en repetirlo.-

title: Camera in room and horrible/rude staff!
text: I have never written a review before but after a horrible experience I feel the need to warn people before booking this hotel. My boyfriend and I stayed here this summer. It was a last minute trip to the city and we were very excited. I always read reviews before booking any hotel and the radio city apartments had decent ratings and was affordable. When we arrived it was extremely hot outside. The lobby was the same temperature. No AC. We got our keys which were actual keys not the cards you usually get. Our Room was a penthouse suite with a mini kitchen. The room was dated and noisy which was expected considering we could see Times Square from our window. So far I was ok with our choice but wasn't super impressed from the beginning. After walking from central station all the way to the hotel I was hot and wanted to take a shower. I go to open a clean folded towel and was about to wipe my face when I noticed that it had skid mark stains on it! I was so grossed out but decided that I would not complain since we were only here for one night.  After our showers we went out for dinner and came back to the room. As my boyfriend is laying on the bed he noticed something funny on the tv. When we took a closer look we realized that it was a mini camera like those used for Skype which was plugged into a box behind the tv. I started to freak out wondering if someone had been recording us. We had been undressed in the room and intimate. I could have been wrong but I still felt so violated! All these thoughts were now running through my head. Was someone watching us? It was late at night and I was exhausted so I unplugged it and decided to confront management in the morning. When we woke up the housekeeper was in the hallway and my boyfriend asked her if she knew what this device was. She acted very defensive and said it was for the remote which I couldn't believe seeing as it worked just fine without this piece. We even showed her that it worked without it. She left the room and didn't say anything. We packed our bags at about 10:30 am and went to return our keys at the front desk. There were several men working. I showed them the device and asked why there was a camera in our room and that I wanted an explanation.  One of the men were super rude stating why did you take that! He also claimed that it was for the tv remote. Once again I wanted to know how it was for the remote if the remote worked just fine after I unplugged it. The man became very aggressive towards me saying I'm not going to sit here and argue with you. I was shocked at his tone of voice. Yet he still couldn't provide me with an explanation. I've never been treated like this by hotel staff! This just made me even more suspicious and upset. Then I asked to speak to a manager. He said there's not a manager on you can go call this number on the phone in the lobby. He didn't apologize or accommodate us. My boyfriend called the number and explained our issue and it was another man who answered. We asked if it was a manager he said no. What hotel doesn't have a manager present on a weekday? This man was also rude to us. We had to catch our train so we left feeling completely disgusted with our stay. Even if we were proven wrong and it wasn't a camera it was the way we were treated for asking a simple question that really destroyed our trip. Please avoid this hotel at all costs!

title: Very poor staff and customer relations
text:
My wife and three children age 16,13 and 5 booked this hotel in May 2016 due to the location near times sq to prevent a lot of travelling between areas, this is by far not a cheap hotel costing us well over 2000 dollars for a family room.
After arriving from an 8hr flight and a 2hr wait in ridiculas visa queues and then a 30 min journey by pre booked cab i was greeted at the hotel by the most unhelpful staff i have ever dealt with in any country i have visited, they told us our room wasnt available due to a computer malfunction but we could have two seperate rooms (not what you want on a family holiday!!) . They told us it would be sorted the next day and we could speak to a manager, we gave in for the night and agreed.
The next day we had a pre-booked trip to 911 so left around 9am, we returned about 6pm and i asked the same staff member who had been there the night before if he had the room sorted, he said no as i hadnt been to see him, i told him re trip etc and he said the manager had now gone home. So again i asked him if he had spoke to the manager regarding he matter and he said NO as i wasnt there??
So i asked him for our room and was it ready , he shrugged his shoulders. After a 20 min discussinon with him he amazingly found a room we had booked and told me to drop the other keys off in ten mins!
There were three staff there and no one offered to help move five bags from the second floor to the fifth, we had been in the room for no longer than ten mins and there was a knock on the door by a staff member asking us for the other rooms keys...what did he think i was going to do with them!!
All week i asked to see the manager to discuss the matter and everyday they were busy or in meetings, the last day my wife spoke to someone on the hone who offered $27 for our inconvenience......what an utter joke!!
Upon booking out this was not taken off our bill and have still not received it.
Great location and decent rooms to stay in, however the staff are an utter disgrace and unhelpful and unfriendly and was hard work to get a "good morning" out of them.

title: Muy buena elección en Nueva York por ubicación y relación precio-calidad.
text:
Radio City Apartments se encuentra en Manhattan, en el Midtown, muy próximo a Times Square y a Rockefeller Center y a pocas cuadras de Central Park. Por su ubicación se puede acceder caminando a muchas atracciones como las mencionadas u otras como catedral de San Patricio, Museo MOMA, Grand Terminal, Edificio Chrysler, etc y/o recorrer las mejores cuadras de 5ta Avenida o Brodway, y, además se dispone en las inmediaciones de varias bocas de subte para dirijirse a otros puntos como Battery Park en el extremo sur de Manhattan desde donde parten los ferrys hacia Estatua de la Libertad.
En cuanto al hotel en sí, al ser apartamentos cuenta con cocina comedor con lo cual se alivia el costo de tener que comer  siempre afuera. Las habitaciones y baño son pequeños pero entendemos que es Manhattan donde los m2 valen mucho. Las camas son cómodas. Las habitaciones cuentan con TV y aire acondicionado. El wifi es gratuito. La conserjería cuenta con personal que habla español y muy dispuesto a responder a toda necesidad. Es posible dejar el equipaje a su cuidado si tienes un intervalo entre el check out (11:00) y el check in de tu vuelo. Recomiendo en ese tiempo visitar el Museo MoMA y particularmente el piso de los "clásicos", dado que está a pocas cuadras, es de rápido acceso, cuenta con ambiente climatizado y es recorrible en relativamente poco tiempo si lo comparamos por ejemplo con el Metropolitano.

title: Perfect for Families
text:
We had the most amazing few days in NYC and this hotel really helped make the trip so wonderful.
I'd done my homework and knew that it was an older hotel and that it wasn't ultra modern and brand spanking new. But it went way beyond our expectations.
To have an apartment so close to Times Square was wonderful especially as we have 2 teens. The space was really great.
The staff were always very friendly and helpful.
The hotel although needing a little paint work was so clean.

We loved using Toasties next door.
We also loved the road that the hotel is situated on. It had a clean feel to it. Much nicer than many of the other streets off Times Square.
It felt very safe.

We can't wait to go back.

title: AVOID, AVOID, AVOID !
text:
Arrived last Thursday to very disorganised, unprofessional staff who tried to overcharge on our agreed price. Thankfully our emails told a different story. We were then escorted to a lift in serious need of a service to a Queen room not fit for one person never mind two. It was stinking of musty carpet and rang of noisy air conditioning and was clearly close to a restaurant because you would have thought the food was being cooked there!
Our second room was a delux two bed and again for the remainder of our guests was basic, cramped and had a really foul smell. Instantly we complained and were told it was an error to send us there as the room needed a professional clean. What was wrong at reception that they could NOT get it right? We had just arrived from Ireland and simply wanted checked in to start our holiday.
Every room we were shown was either stinking of food, was musty or was a building site use to maintenance in rooms surrounding it.
Our party was united we were not staying in this accommodation. We knew from reviews it wias supposed to be clean and very basic with a great location. The latter is the only reason you would stay there. 
Zac the door bell staff and the domestic staff were the only accommodating members of staff with any common sense. They tried so hard with extra towels, pillows etc to cover over the appalling senior staff at reception. Avoid Carlos who works in the evening. He really is not suited to reception. He is unprofessional and rude!
We ended up 4 hours later finding an amazing hotel which was spacious, much more central in Times Square where the staff could welcome, secure two rooms beside each other that was superbly located and helped us kick start the holiday, eventually, that we anticipated earlier that day for very little extra.
If you want a cheap accommodation that is really basic, smelly and very contained then opt for the Radio City. We definitely made the right choice to get our money back and leave immediately!

title: Emplacement et service de chambre !
text: Autant dire que l'emplacement est idéale, la fenêtre du salon a vu sur quelques lumières de pub de times square. On va au coin de la rue, on traverse on est au M&Ms. Donc en même pas 3 minutes (le temps d'attendre le feu piéton) on est sur Times Square. Rabais sur le prix du parking 24h, service gardiennage des bagages, room service, etc .. que des points positifs. 2 chambres (2 lits simple + 1 lit double) et un salon/salle à manger avec un canapé assez grand pour y dormir pour une 5ème personne.

title: Times Square affordable
text: Excellent hotel right in the heart of Times Square. Very clean and affordable, staff was very polite and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Manhattan and it will be my first choice for my next NYC visit

title: Great location
text:
Staying in NYC for 5 days, and these apartments are well placed for shops and sightseeing. They aren't fancy on the inside but to be honest we are only really here to sleep. Our room has a smal lounge kitchenette area, and the great thing that we would never do in the uk is that they provide some free coffee and tea, but also teatowel, washing up liquid, etc
Clean and just what we need

title: Beware Doesnt accept prepaid cards for payment !!!
text: Very convenient location . Fantastic 2 bedroom apartment on the 10th floor ... Downside Wouldn"t Accept prepaid card as payment (i have been done with fraud 2 before elsewhere  so didn"t want anything connected to my bank Account . Also beware of the 250 dollars deposit they want if you pick non smoking as in a previous post .

title: Au coeur du réacteur !
text: Et c est bien ça le principal pour cet appart hôtel  un brin suranné mais tellement bien placé et au final assez bon marché.  Time square à  1 min à pied,  idem pour le métro . Franchement, je recommande vivement pour ceux qui passent  quelques jours sur New York

title: Terrific for What It Is.
text:
This is great for exactly what it is, an apartment that has become a hotel. Perfect for a family visiting for a few days and not so inclined to eat EVERY meal out. Good location. This is NOT a high end luxury hotel so if that is what you seek...keep looking. But if your needs are modest and especially if you'll be in town with the whole family this is a fine option. 

Our one complaint: the sheets were anything but soft. We suggest fabric softener or just not buying the ones made from shredded wheat.

title: An address to recommend!
text: Very convenient location on the 49th and 7th/6th avenue, on Time Square and lots of restaurants at the door (pasta, pizza, Indian, Chinese and Japanese restaurants within 20meters of the entrance!!). Friendly and helpful staff. Large 1-bedroom apartment, fully equipped, clean and in perfect condition. For sure a great address in NY and a very good value!

title: EXCELENTE OPCION
text: En un lugar inmejorable a pasos de Time Square, a media cuadra de la 7ma avenida y de la salida del subte y con apartamentos muy bien mantenidos y amplios.El penthouse es super amplio y con una vista de la ciudad increible.

title: Bra för familjer
text:
Lägenhet med skylten "Times Square" i köksfönstret. Absolut ingen lyx men väldigt funktionellt. Perfekt läge på 49 de gatan för teatrar, tunnelbanan, Radio City , Top of the Rock mm mm.
Det fanns även en bra livsmedelsaffär och ett flertal restauranger i närheten.

title: IL SOGNO NEW YORK
text:
Diversi mesi prima della data programmata x la vacanza  (8 - 16 agosto  2016 )  a New York  , abbiamo prenotato  on line  quasi in contemporanea :  prima la compagnia aerea  EMIRATES ( di cui già conoscevamo l'ottimo servizio x averci viaggiato in precedenza x un'altra vacanza nella fantastica  Dubai )  e poi l' hotel RADIO CITY APARTMENTS  ( sempre on line) proprio a due passi a piedi da TIME SQUARE e quindi in pieno centro.   Grande aereo a due piani , che ha tenuto il volo superbamente senza sobbalzi o forti vuoti d'aria , servizio ineccepibile con personale che parlava anche l'italiano disponibile e cortese ogni oltre dire !!!!!!!        
Il volo è durato 6.30  all'andata e 6 ore al ritorno  !!!!!!!!!!  BREVISSIMO  !!!!!!!
Abbiamo scelto l'apartment x avere un po' di spazio in più , x aver la possibilità di far colazione all'italiana e magari cucinarci qualcosa al volo all'italiana . Avevamo a disposizione una camera molto grande con 2 letti matrimoniali  ( eravamo in 2 : io e mia figlia ) comodissimi ,  un tavolo , comodini, una grande cassettiera , un armadio a muro,  un cucinotto attrezzatissimo con stoviglie , cucina elettrica, caffettiera , bollitore, ferro e tavola x stirare , forno elettrico e a microonde,  caffettiera americana , un bagno non grande ma ben attrezzato di prodotti e di asciugami nuovi e morbidissimi che ci cambiavano tutti i giorni e tutti i giorni venivano a ripulire l'apartment. IL WI-FI era gratis e si riceveva benissimo .  Il brutto era la moquette sul pavimento ... non osavamo nemmeno chiederci quanto fosse pulita !!! l'unica cosa  brutta è stata questa , x tutto l'altro ci siamo trovati benissimo ed anche il rapporto prezzo-qualità : buono , tenuto conto dei prezzi alti degli hotel a New York  !!!!  Le nostre finestre davano su una stradina laterale dell'hotel  x cui  il silenzio di notte e di giorno era OTTIMO !!!!  Come , non ottima ma direi eccellente era la posizione : tutto a portata di mano TIME SQUARE , ROCKEFELLER CENTER, LA CATTEDRALE DI ST. PATRICK'S , MOMA ,IL CENTRAL PARK , IL CHRYSLER BUILDING, L'EMPIRE STATE BUILDING , LA 5 AVENUE ,  LA STAZIONE DELLA METROPOLITANA E LA FERMATA DEI VARI BUS X IL TOUR DELLA CITY. A fianco dell'ingresso dell'hotel vi è un ristorante ( al quale si accede anche dall'hotel )  una pizzeria e alcuni ristorantini cinesi. Inoltre consiglio una visita  ( prendendo la metropolitana) al MEMORIAL delle TORRI GEMELLE , dove hanno eretto un grande monumento a forma di aquila , il museo , 2 grandi vasche e un grattacielo meraviglioso. Siamo vicini al porto e prendiamo  un grande vaporetto arancione ( STATEN FERRY ISLAND ) che gratuitamente ci trasporta nel  NEW JERSEY passando accanto alla STATUA DELLA LIBERTA' .   BELLISSIMA LA SPIAGGIA DI CONEY ISLAND ,con il grandioso parco di divertimenti e  il suo.... OCEANO  !!!!!!!!! Col BIG BUS  48h ( 50 euro circa ) abbiamo fatto il tour della citta  di giorno e di notte , visitato : il  DOWNTOWN , l'UPTOWN , BROOKLIN,  LITTLE ITALY  , la crociera  sul fiume HUDSON e sull'isola della STATUA DELLA LIBERTA' ... che dire ????   TUTTO FANTASTICO E MERAVIGLIOSO !!!!!   HA contato poco ( lo dico ora !!! ) il caldo torrido oltre 40 gradi !!!!!!    Carissima l'acqua : le bottiglie d'acqua , che si acquistavano  a non finire x combattere il caldo : 3 euro da mezzo litro , 6 euro quelle  da litro  !!!!!!   Da NON DIMENTICARE : PORTATEVI UNA PRESA AMERICANA  E CHIUDETE LA VALIGIA CON UN LUCCHETTO TSA , x evitare che la polizia americana ,  nel controllare il bagaglio  da stiva ,  ve la faccia ritrovare legata con una fascetta di plastica . 
IL NOSTRO SOGNO AMERICANO SI E' REALIZZATO  ....  INDIMENTICABILE  !!!!!

title: Lower than expectations
text: My dad, husband and I stayed in a 2 bedroom apartment for 2 nights. The beds were comfy, the living area was clean and tidy, had a little kitchenette etc, there were a few bad points to the stay as well. Wifi dropped in and out and was not secure with any passwords. People at the front desk were helpful, but weren't overly friendly. Don't use the elevators, unless you want to wait until your hair dries. You'd be able to walk up to the top floor via the stairs before your elevator got to the bottom. As soon as you stepped onto your floor, there was a very strange smell, almost like a mildew smell, which carried all the way through to your apartment. Aircon was very noisy. On saying all of this, we DID enjoy ourselves.. It's in a great location, with restaurants and times square within spitting distance. Besides, when you're in New York City for just 2 nights, all you need is a comfy bed to rest your head at night time!!!

title: HOTEL ESTILO FLAT - MUITO BEM LOCALIZADO
text: HOTEL É ANTIGO, PORÉM FOI REFORMADO E É MUITO CONFORTÁVEL. O ponto forte do hotel é a localização,  ele fica próximo da quinta avenida, e a três quadras da Time Square, Madame Tussaud, vários teatros, etc. em sentido contrario fica o Central Park, Museu Historia Natural, Edifício Dakota, etc. e principal fica a duas quadra de um mercado (quem conhece NY sabe que e difícil achar um mercado ou mercearia). o hotel tem restaurante... e fica muito perto de uma estação do metro...

title: Read the fine print
text: The location is fantastic, the hotel is clean, it's nice to have a full kitchen (although we didn't use it), staff was friendly, and I got a terrific rate.  I was not prepared for a $250 deposit because it was a "smoke free" facility.  My daugher and I had a very tight budget for our 24 hour trip in NYC, and did not plan this expense.  I did find an e-mail when I returned home, this deposit was mentioned in tiny print that I had overlooked. Our evening was not as exciting as planned because we didn't have the money to play with.  The $250 was returned to us when we checked out, however no one checked the room first to see if it smelled of smoke, so really what was the point.  Lesson learned, read the fine print

title: Better Than Expected
text: We choose Radio City Apartments because we were traveling with our family of 5. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling with children. The layout is very nice and the apartment style rooms are spacious and convenient. The rooms were simple, but very clean. The elevators were always fast. The front desk was very nice and helpful with storing our luggage on our last day. They also offered to get us a cab (I saw an earlier post that the wasn't available). The location can't be beat if you are going to the city for site seeing. I found it to be an incredible value for the location.

title: Muy buena opcion en Manhattan
text: Apartamentos amplios, muy limpios y completos. Ideal para pasar unos dias en New York. Excelente ubicacion, a metros de Times Square, hay muchisimas opciones de transporte publico en la zona. En el front desk siempre hay al menos una persona que habla español.

title: Family break in nyc
text: This is an excellent apartment with a great location between Rockefeller centre and Times Square, 5 minutes either way. We stayed in a two bed apartment with three children. The apartment had all we needed, a living area with a kitchenette to prepare small meals. The apartment was clean and although a little dated was great for what we needed. The main positive is the fantastic location, we were able to visit attractions come back to the apartments mid afternoon for a rest and then head out again later. The subway station is at the end of the street and there are so many places of various types to eat within 5 minutes walk. There are also mini supermarkets within less than 10 minutes walk to stock up on any goods and put in a full size fridge freezer. Great apartment, would stay again and fabulous location

title: Perfect appartement op een super locatie
text: In 1 woord geweldig!. Gezin met 2 kinderen hadden 1 slaapkamer appartement. Voor New Yorkse begrippen echt ruim! Complete keuken, koelkast, goede airco! Fijne badkamer. Nog soort van uitzicht op de gebouwen rond Times Square. Loopt hotel uit, 50 meter naar links, nog keer links en je bent zo op Times Square. Super centraal. Enige nadeel vonden wij de kleine bedden. Maar dat wisten we van te voren met 2 x Queenbed. Voordeel was dat we nog extra bedbank in de kamer hadden. Goede wifi. Vriendelijk personeel. Afhaalpizza naast de deur. Mochten we ooit nog weer naar New York gaan, wordt dit zeker ons overnachtingsadres.

title: Great stay
text: Stayed here for 4 nights in August.  The location is perfect, close to everything.  All the staff we encountered was very nice, always greeted us with a smile.  Our room was super clean and beds comfortable.  Even though it's considered to be apartments, our room was cleaned daily and we were getting clean towels every day.  The only drawback is there was no table or chairs in the room, so if we wanted to sit down, beds were the only place to sit. The air conditioner was very loud, sometimes waking me up at night/ Otherwise great stay in the city, will definitely stay here again.

title: estancia con grupo grande
text:
Estoy muy satisfecha con estos apartamentos, muy limpios, confortables, y silenciosos. fuimos 9 personas para dos apartamentos y tuvieron la delicadeza de dejarnos uno a la lado del otro. Llevamos casi 24 maletas y la recepción a pesar de ser muchos fue muy linda....nos reimos mucho...con muchos chistes...como por ejemplo que cerrarian elhotel porque se habia completado solo con nosotros....o si nos veniamos a vivir....fue todo muy simpatico.
lo recomiendo y seré una asidua visitante de este apartamento, el precio ESPECTACULAR, ya que al estar a una cuadra del times square podrían haber sido mas caros pero no es si.
Un abrazo y las gracias para los recepcionistas.

title: Dejligt hotel med super beliggenhed
text:
Hotellet ligger meget centralt - 3 min. gang fra Time Square. 
Vi boede i en lejlighed med stue/køkken og et soveværelse. Værelset var pænt og rent. Personalet var venligt. Der var, hvad vi skulle bruge i lejligheden f.eks. kaffemaskine, køleskab mm. 
Vi kan varmt anbefale dette hotel.

title: Excellent Location
text: I stayed here for 2 nights in March.  I found the location excellent and good value for Manhattan.  The staff at reception were helpful and gave us directions when asked.  There was a little deli a couple of doors down where we got a breakfast roll and made coffee in our room one of the mornings. The room was small but all you needed for a base to explore New York. I would definitely return if back in New York.

title: Prima ligging, vergane glorie
text: Voor wie een hotel nabij Times Square zoekt, is dit een prima lokatie. Nog betaalbaar en okay. Je merkt wel aan alles dat het een oud gebouw is. Personeel is erg vriendelijk. Pasta restaurant was niet de moeite waard.

title: Ticks all the boxes - excellent
text: We stayed at Radio city apartments for 5 nights - it was a perfect choice. Great position, clean, comfy pillows, fluffy towels and laundry facility in the basement. Small kitchenette perfect for breakfast. It's a short walk to Times Square and theatres. Although located in busy area our street facing room was quiet - nor were we disturbed by other guests in hotel. Great place will definetly stay here again if visiting New York.

title: Good location
text: The hotel is conveniently located for Broadway and Times Square. Rooms a reasonable size but quite dated, bed and mattress needed replacing, not a great nights sleep. Reasonably quiet considering location.

title: Buena relacion precio , ubicacion
text: La ubicacion es buenisima, 49 entre 7Av y Av Americas ( 6ta Av ) . a apenas 50 mts bocas del subte linea amariila N,Q,R y a una cuadra de la azul , y la naranja . Y a tan solo 3 cuadras de Times Square , en la esquina M&M  , El edificio es viejo pero bien mantenido . Bien en la recepcion , hablan español y todo el personal de mantenimiento habla español ,.Yo alquile un dpto de 2 dormitorios  Tenia 1 dormitorio con cama matrinomial , y otro con 2 camas grandes en las que dormian mis hijos de 15 y 19 años . Si son chicos pueden dormir 2 en cada cama. Son habitaciones chicas como todas por la zona, con cajoneras para guardar la ropa y una barra para colgar ropa. En el comedor hay otro sillon que se hace cama, mesa con 4 sillas , heladera , microonda, bacha con canilla y vajilla de melamina .No tiene caja de seguridad en la habitacion , tenes que pedirles y tienen las cajas abajo como las del Banco. Tienen aires acondicionado de ventana viejitos que hacen bastante ruido , punto en contra. de noche el de nuestra habitacion lo apagabamos porque hacia mucho ruido . No son insonorizadas las habitaciones, por lo que se escuchan permanentes sirenas ( estamos en medio de manhattan ) . Lo bueno es que llegas tan muerto de caminar todo el dia que apoyas la cabeza y te dormis. Tiene 1 baño , cosa que queda medio justo si esa habitacion la toman 6 personas. Un dia se nos tapo el inodoro y otro andaba una cucaracha , llamamos a mantenimiento y vinieron enseguida , pero no me gusto el tema de la cucaracha :( . No tiene desayuno pero cruzando hay un starbuck , un eu le pain, un pan le quotidien y un carrito de una colombiana con buen cafe y facturas , en la otra esquina Magnolia Bakery.

title: For New York, very good. Small rooms, but otherwise very acceptable. Good location
text: Very acceptable flat. Two bedroomed. Not huge, but this is New York.... Clean, great location (but tricky to get to if you are driving - NYC one way system). Major attractions within a  short walk. We were very happy with it.

title: Convenient, comfy and affordable
text: The location was great for our New York itinerary. It was conveniently located between Rockefeller and Times Square with very easy access to the subway system. We were pleasantly surprised by how clean and quiet it was. Staff was friendly and accommodating, offering umbrellas when it rained, kindly helping with luggage and answering our questions. For the two of us in the queen bedroom the space felt adequate, though we didn't cook. Four more of our party stayed in the two bedroom suite.  On arrival one of the stone stairs was cracked and loose,  and within a day it was fixed. We also liked the pizza shop downstairs.

title: Good for the price
text: I stayed here for a night when I stopped off in NYC before working upstate. It was a reasonable self contained room. Could do with a major facelift but for the price its fine. The staff were nice and helped with bags up the stairs to the entrance, just don't be silly like me and forget to budget for the city tax on your arrival!

title: Great Location comfortable beds excellent staff assistance
text:
We stayed last 2 nights of our new york trip.  Rooms were self contained with kitchen and eating area.  Full bath.   Staff were excellent with assistance.   Very close to downtown and broadway.
we stayed on 6th floor at front of building.   Noise was terrible at night got woke up 3;30am by jack hammer.  There is no noise restrictions in new york city.  Construction goes on all night.

Would recommend staying there again maybe a room at the back.

title: Great place to stsy
text: Spent 3 nights here.  Very good location between Times Square and Central Park near other sites.   Room well equipped with comfy beds and not too noisy.   Pizza place by front door is a bonus if you need something quick to eat.   Staff very helpful.  We would stay here again.

title: Vacaciones
text:
Muy buena ubicación, a 1 1/2 cda  del Rockefeller, a 2 del Time Square. Un privilegio. Infraestructura antigua, reciclada , moderno. La atención de conserjería, buena, nada llamativo. El apartamento totalmente reciclado a nuevo. La vista no era muy linda, pero prácticamente lo usamos para  dormir.  (3er p). El servicio de limpieza optimo. Totalmente equipado, heladera, cocina, utensilios  cocinar. 
Lo recomiendo, para familias es ideal.

title: Overnight stay in NY
text:
Wanted to surprise the family, ok more my daughter, with an overnight stay in NY.  I was in NJ for a 2 week business trip and they flew in to join me for a few days.  We caught the train to NY and checked out the History museum.  Left there to check in to Radio City Apts.  The staff was extremely nice and helpful.  My disappointment was with the room itself.  To start with we were given two keys, yes real keys.  One for the door and the other for the dead bolt.  Not a problem, I actually liked that since almost every location now uses cards.  We had a two room apartment with a bedroom having two double beds and living room with pull out sofa.  The apartment included a refrigerator and stove/oven.  My wife and I thought the bed mattress was too hard.  It was, to me, almost as hard as mattresses I slept on in Thailand.  The kids thought they were fine.  That I could easily deal with and get over.  The windows had a view of the parking deck right behind the hotel with it's nicely BRIGHT shining lights.  What made me dislike the stay was the AC units.  The AC units were the standard window unit you could probably find in a Wal-mart or Lowes.  I grew up with window units so, the units themselves were not the problem.  Remember my talking about the parking deck window view and the bright, very bright, lights from it?
