Now add in a window AC unit and remember it is summer time.  If you wanted to use the AC at night while sleeping, guess what?  You can't close the curtains because they will cover the AC units, blocking any cool/cold air.  Since you can't close the curtains, you're left with bright lights shining in the bedroom and living room while trying to sleep.  If I had known, I would have packed eye masks for everyone to use.  After a very long day of walking and seeing the city, you really want to sleep without the room feeling as if it has an early morning sunrise all night.  Especially for the room price paid which was slightly better than the surrounding hotels. 

The kids didn't care, but of course they weren't the one paying the bills either.  And again, the staff was excellent to talk to and deal with.  Not a problem with them at all.

title: Vieillot
text: Les appartements sont un peu vieillots, très petits, la moquette mérite d'être changée, et l'isolation au bruit n'est pas bonne, on entend tout. Par contre, accueil correct, prix démocratique pour New York et très très bien situé sur time Square.

title: Posizione perfetta
text:
Non potrebbe essere più comodo: a 2 passi (veri) da Times Square e dal Rockfeller Center, con tante linee della subway a portata. Al di là degli spazi comuni datati e piccoli, l'appartamento ha tutto ciò che serve: camera ampia con 2 letti "queen size", sala con angolo cottura funzionale, tavolo e divano letto, bagno nuovo e pulito.
Cambio lenzuola ogni 3 giorni e 2 televisori: perfetto per la nostra famiglia di 4 persone.
Poco luminoso a causa dei grattacieli che lasciano le finestre sempre in ombra, ma assolutamente da consigliare.

title: Very unclean room - I didn't stay the night!
text: I ended up checking out of the hotel four hours after I checked in, because I was so disappointed.  To begin, most of the elevator buttons didn't even light up when you pressed them in the elevator car, or to go down from the 8th floor, so you couldn't tell if you called for the elevator until you could hear it moving.  Getting to my floor, it smelled strange.  Upon entering my room, there was hair in my bed under the pillow, public hair on the sink, hair in the shower, and I got a piece of copper wire stuck in my foot from the bathroom floor.  It was also very noisy in the room.  I understand it's near Times Square and it's a busy area, but the windows did not seal out the noise (it almost seemed like they were wide open), and I could hear music, cars, and everything else over the sound of the window air conditioning unit.  Between the bed being unclean and too hard, I decided to take the last train out of NYC back home and just got home really late.  It was a complete waste of my money, but lesson learned for future travel to NYC.  I do not recommend this hotel.

title: Plain old hotel with a good location
text:
The hotel is very Plain with old facilities, because of its location, the hotel noisy.
The rooms are small (like most of NY hotels) but If you are more than 4 people, the family rooms are big enough to make you feel comfortable.

title: Excelente!!
text: Este hotel fica muito bem localizado, próximo a Times Square e a estação de metro. Os quartos são simples, porém equipados com uma pequena cozinha, com microondas, geladeira e fogão. Para quem busca um conforto e preço justo esta é um ótima opção. O elevador é antigo, assim como o hotel, mas não tem nenhum chero de mofo no hotel, valeu muito a pena a estadia.

title: Placement ideal
text:
Il est clair que l atout numéro 1 de ce logement est l emplacement a un prix accessible. Il a tout d un hotel, accueil H24, garde bagages, personnel tres a l écoute.
Il n est pas "design" mais néanmoins c est propre et fonctionnel. On peut y faire à manger quand on est gavé de nourriture américaine.
Le seul reproche que nous ferions est la clim qui est bruyante quand on la laisse tourner la nuit.
Pour vivre NY Times square en live c est le lieu ideal.

title: Great location & value
text: We stayed here for 5 nights, it's a top location for a first visit to NYC. It's right on time square, close to bus tours, Broadway theaters & subway stations. It has a little kitchenette which was great so we did breakfast in the room to save a little money (no complimentary breakfast). Noise was the biggest downside with nearby construction and traffic noise very noticeable.

title: Great location and facilities
text: Spent 5 days here in one of their two bedroom apartments. Location could not really be much better for Times Square with easy access to pretty much anything you are likely to need or want to see. The apartment isn't massive but we found it big enough for four adults. A second bathroom would have been a bonus but we made it work with one. The small kitchen area was really good just to be able to do some simple breakfasts. It was very hot during our visit and the aircon was really effective in every room. We had a slight problem with the toilet and someone was sent up within 5 minutes of calling the front desk. Good sized TVs in every room with a decent cable service including free on-demand. Although expensive compared to general US hotels, these apartments are good value for New York.

title: Hotel Rádio City
text:
Excelente localização , ótimo preço, quartos amplos , camas confortáveis , limpeza do quarto, ótima . 
Funcionários super atenciosos , recomendo muito este hotel . 
A poucos metros do metrô. 
Tem geladeira, fogão elétrico , microondas , ótimo para fazer alguma refeição por lá.

title: Great location
text: A clean, great apartment in a fab location. Just big enough for a family of four (parents relegated to sofa bed). Would def recommend! Showers take a while to warm up and air conditioning a little noisy but all of this is more than compensated for by the great location and comparatively reasonable price. Excellent, really helpful staff!

title: Economical, friendly staff and minutes to Broadway and Time Square!
text: We asked for a bachelor apartment that faced Time Square and had a great view of city life.  This affordable apartment had a small kitchenette/dinette with cooking facilities, a comfy double bed and a clean bathroom.  Easy walk to museums,theatre and delis and buses into lower Manahattan and Central Park as well as the village were a breeze.  A must stay if you like to make some of your own meals and snacks and taste the local flavour at bargain prices.  The hotel staff helped out tremendously with advice and extras for the apartment.

title: Recomiento altamente este Apart Hotel
text: Nos hospedamos en el apart en el mes de Mayo, me decidi por las opiniones que leo en tripadvisor, precio y ubicación. Fuimos 3 y nos dieron una habitación grande de dos ambientes, el baño impecable con todo lo necesario para la ducha. La cocina muy linda y funcionaba todo muy bien, sobre la 48st y 7st hay un supermercado se llama Food imperium, venden de todo y fresco, por lo cual íbamos a comprar para cocinar en la habitación y la verdad que te ahorras bastante si no queres salir todos los días a comer afuera. En la esquina del hotel podes tomar la línea amarilla tanto al dowtown como uptown, recontracomodo, nosotros salíamos temprano y después de caminarnos todo, cualquier línea en NY conecta con la amarilla en Time Square Station y te deja ahí del hotel para llegar a descansar. A la noche salíamos a caminar por time square dado que queda en la esquina a la vuelta del hotel, excelente. Hice unas compras por Amazon y me recibieron todos los paquetes sin costo adicional, me llego todo perfecto, abre pedido 6 paquetes que me fueron llegando durante la semana que me hospede. El Personal del Hotel es muy cordial y responden a cualquier inquietud, hablan español. Para ir al aeropuerto desde el hotel nos llamaron un transfer privado grande y cómodo para transportar todo lo que llevábamos: P La verdad lo súper recomiendo, el wifi andaba bien, la tv perfecta y las camas muy cómodas. No tengo idea si hay ruido o se escucha algo, la verdad que ir a NY es agotador por lo cual comíamos y caíamos muertos para el otro día temprano arrancar.

title: Perfect
text: We really enjoyed our stay at radio city apartments. The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly. When it rained they pulled out a bunch of umbrellas for guest at the hotel. The two bedroom apartment was spacious and clean. It is in a great location for Times Square visits and Rockefeller Center. We would totally stay here again and again.

title: Decent Hotel, great location
text:
Very happy with the location around the corner from Times Square and Rockefeller Centre. We had a double room as no twins available, decent room small but has fridge , stove, etc for those wanting to cook something, small bathroom but clean. Room itself is small but as we are only sleeping here no trouble at all. Older furnishings that need updating, check in was fast and staff welcoming. Glad it has a lift ! 
Overall nice hotel but the location is the best part.

title: A week's stay with the fam-bam
text: It was the four of us sharing an apartment. Our apartment was one bedroom with two beds which was sufficient and we had a small kitchenette cum living cum dining room. The bathroom also was small. Our apartment was on the  3rd floor. We did not ask for an apartment with a view (i don't know whether they had that option) but we did not need it since we did not plan on staying in a lot. They also have elevators and there are two - three eating joints right next to it. There is also a soup and sandwich joint opposite to the apartments which i absolutely loved. The biggest PRO about this place is that its right in the Times Square, the metro station is just at the end of  the street and on one side you have the Tower of Rock. So for tourists if you need an apartment to stay at this is the one, I have stayed here on both my visits to NYC and i would go back again if i'm at NYC.

title: My Daughter's BDay trip
text: This hotel was perfect!!! I was concerned it not being "name brand" but who could afford "name brand" in NYC? We were super early and was pleasantly surprised to be able to check into our room at 8AM!!! Check in was simple, they still have real keys for your room. This may be a turn off for some people but it was fine. There was the regular door lock plus a deadbolt. I felt perfectly safe in my room. The elevator was small but you're only in there for seconds. The room had plenty of room and was clean. We had a coffee maker, stove and good sized refrigerator with freezer. This saved money on breakfast as there is a market almost on every corner. The bathroom was small but worked out fine. At the price of this room I was worried about its exact location but it really is only 2 blocks from Time Square and 1 block from Radio City Music Hall. To get to GMA in the morning it's only about a 7 min walk. Not only did we get an early check in but on our last day we got a late check out at 1 PM. The front desk arranged for us a car to the airport.  This hotel isn't the Ritz but it was perfect for us. Clean and a great location. We usually stay in Hilton Hotels

title: Big lights surround your place
text: The location was the best that we had booked, with every attraction, restaurant, shop and/or theatre at your doorstep or around the corner. The metro station is located just down the road to your left as you come out from the apartments facing the other side of the road. As you are located in the midst of everything, the place is reasonably quiet, even at night. Would definitely visit this place again as it has guest services on level 2 and discount vouchers near the front desk for places. The staff are rather helpful with luggage and storage, and the house keepers are really pleasant.

title: Great setup in a fabulous location
text: Nice little apartment with full size refrigerate, full stove top, microwave and dishes for a decent price in NYC.  The room was clean and surprisingly quiet.  One block from the subway line to Laguardia.

title: Excelente Estadia
text: Estuvimos con la familia ,un departamento para 6 ,2 habitaciones ,un baño,cocina, muy buena ubicación,cerca de todo ,hay cerca un subte, y te moves a todos lados .,Time Square a la vuelta , Rokefeler Center y 5ta avenida a 2 calles, el hotel es reciclado conservando el estilo original ,son departamento para 2 .4 y 6 personas , te dejan para el desayuno, y cambian toallas todos los días, son superatentos , mi hija se olvido la cámara de fotos abajo ,donde esta la caja fuerte ,y se la devolvieron, super recomendable!!!!!!  Ah hablan español casi todos ,wifi gratis

title: Grei leilighet
text: Grei og særs sentral leilighet i New York - ingen ting er langt unna. Tok taxi fra flyplassen ( fast pris ) og bestilte bil på hotellet for retur - overkommelig pris. Grei pizza plass på gata utenfor hotellet / frokost & lunsj likeså. Kommer gjerne tilbake.

title: good apartment in quiet central position.
text: Room was standard size for NY, but with two large beds we felt quite comfortable. The bathroom was fully equipped with fluffy towels and lovely toiletteries. The bonus was the kitchenette, a large fridge, stove and microwave, table and chairs for two and reasonably stocked with kitchenware. Saved eating out for 3 meals a day in expensive NY. A supermaket is 5 minutes walk away, as is Times Square and all the buzz of NY, but we heard no noise on our 7th floor. Subways are very close and there is a great Toasties lunch place next door and a pizza restaurant too. Great place to stay without paying the extraordinary high cost of most places.

title: Perfect location
text: Stayed here one night. Perfect location for Times sq, Broadway, Rockefella Centre etc. Lots of places to eat for lunch, breakfast and dinner. The rooms are spacious and loved having a separate bedroom. Would have liked the check in staff to say "please and thank you" though. Great value for the location. Good to be able to leave our bags while we were out and about. We would come back.

title: Great location,  safe,  clean and reasonable.
text: I'll definitely return! Great location.  Plenty of room for NYC standards. Whole kitchen and 2 double beds.  Easy to catch the subway. Short walk to Times Square and Broadway plays. Great restaurants all around.

title: Ottima posizione
text:
Posizione ottima a due passi da Time Square e a 50 m. da una fermata della metropolitana. L'appartamento arredato in maniera essenziale e con mobilio un po' datato ma tuttavia pulito e, nonostante la posizione centrale, il nostro molto silenzioso.
Parti comuni non molto curate e ascensore insufficiente 
Personale gentile e disponibile
Per New York buon compromesso tra prezzo e servizio offerto

title: Excellent position, nice, good prices, noisy air conditioner
text: I agree with other comments: nice hotel, very very convenient position in NYC, the price is adequate. One (big) flaw: the air conditioning machines where old and noisy, there is not much you can do it unless you change them! We had some problems in sleeping for this.

title: Great place to stay in the center of all the action
text: We stayed over the 4th of July holiday for 6 nights. The stay was perfect.   The rooms were updated and very clean. All the staff were awesome. We paid for two rooms and both were perfect.  The extra space we had really made it nice to come back "home" after a long day sightseeing.  We travel a lot and I can honestly say this place is a gem.

title: Excellent location!
text: First time visiting New York and stayed at radio city apartments. Location was excellent so close to Times Square. We were 4 friends staying in the 2 bedroom apartment. First night we had apartment on 3rd floor but came home after a day out to find the kitchen area flooded. The maintenance guy arrived and found a blockage in the pipe. The hotel staff were great and thankfully there was another 2 bedroom apartment available on floor 6. This one was nicer the kitchen area was new and you could tell it had been updated so we were very happy with that. Beds were comfortable and plenty of towels available. Next door attached to the hotel is a restaurant and nice bar and because of the hotels location you also have plenty of other eating places to choose from. Would definitely choose this hotel again if I was to return to NY

title: Buena ubicación
text:
La ubicación del hotel es excelente, se encuentra muy cerca de atracciones interesantes, del Times Square y del Central Park, de hecho se puede ir caminando a todos esos lugares.
El hotel en sí es antiguo, las habitaciones son oscuras y la que me tocó a mi daba hacia la parte de atrás del edificio donde el olor a comida era absolutamente insoportable.
Por otro lado el hecho de que la habitación contara con una zona de star y con cocina lo hace conveniente cuando se viaja con niños que no todas las noches están con ánimos de salir. Así que comprar una pizza y comerla en el apartamento cómodamente, es una buena opción.
La atención del personal del hotel es indiferente, casi desganada.
La limpieza de la habitación fue muy buena y las amenities eran de buena calidad.

title: Radio city apartments the best choice
text:
We are staying in the hotel for 12 nights and are more than happy for choosing it. Besides the perfect location between the 6 and 7 ave....the staff is more than friendly willing to assust with everything. The 2 rooms apartment is most convenient and on top of all..the hotel is very clean. Our son is alergic to dust and if he doesn`t need his pills that is the best sign that the hotel is supper clean. Also free wifi in all areas of the hotel with no problems whatsoever.
We highly recommend and will stay here again on our future trips to NYC.
Thank you for making our stay so pleasant.
The Rosenberg family from Israel

title: Buena ubicación
text:
Cercano de Time Square, de estaciones de metro y de principales atracciones.
El hotel es cómodo, el baño limpio y remodelado, pero otras cosas son muy antiguas, como por ejemplo el lento ascensor. 
Un punto en contra es que no tiene desayuno incluido.

title: Ótimo custo beneficio
text:
Muito bem localizado perto da Times Square funcionários receptivos e muito bem equipado com geladeira , fogão e café como cortesia
Apartamento antigo como a maioria de Nova Yorque  mas limpinho é bem arrumado
Com certeza me hospedaria lá de novo

title: Great location, nice rooms!
text:
The front desk staff were quite polite but seemed to be not very useful. When arriving and leaving, little assistance was offered with luggage on the stairs. When we left one of the construction guys outside helped us with our baggage while the front desk fellows just sat and stared into space!
We loved the location, the updated decor, the size of the room (which was a one bedroom apartment,)  and the ease of checking in. I liked having actual keys as opposed to cards which tend to demagnetize or get lost! I would definitely recommend staying here!

title: What a delightful stay!
text: I had such a wonderful stay at the Radio City Apartments!  The location was wonderful, and I was able to walk to almost all of the places I needed to be that week (specifically, the theaters, Grand Central Station, and Carnegie Hall).  The room was very clean, the staff friendly and helpful.  And I loved having that kitchen!  I was able to stock up on breakfast items and save a lot of money that way, and also was able to bring leftovers home and have a refrigerator to store them in!  I got a "deal" on the rate for the week I was there, which is why I decided to try them.  If only rates weren't higher when I next need to be there in October - but you can bet I'll be staying there again!

title: Family style hotel in NYC with full tiny kitchen but BIG refrigerator!
text:
Somewhat dated but wonderfully located in the heart of Broadway.
Tidy and unpretentious, with helpful desk staff. We asked for a quiet room and
got one!
Not inexpensive, but a little oasis in the middle of bustling NYC.
Sushi restaurant next door was excellent and reasonably priced for NYC.

title: Home Away from Home
text: This is our 10th year a group of six friends meet in NYC and stay at the Radio City Apartments. We love the location and having a full size refrigerator, range and microwave. The location is wonderful on 49th Street between 6th and 7th. The two bedroom option sleeps 4 comfortably. We also use a studio room with two beds for our group. The same front office staff greets us each year and we are always made to feel welcomed. We will be back.

title: Pleasantly Surprised!
text:
Actually stayed in a two bedroom, with a kitchen.  One bed was king - also fit a small crib.  The other was 2 double beds, plenty of walk around room, a dresser, and a TV.  The desk personnel were extremely helpful, everything was very clean. 
The location was so centrally located - easy to get uptown or downtown.  Right around the corner from Times Square and Rockefeller Center.
I thought the price was nicely affordable.

title: Excelente Ubicación
text: Muy buena opción precio/calidad. Cerca de todo, la ubicación es excelente. La atención muy buena. Cada habitación cuenta con una mini cocina que permite comer adentro y ahorrar dinero, ya que comer afuera es caro. Esta muy cerca de las estaciones de subte

title: Family Trip
text:
Radio City Apartments (New York):
Family Holiday

Beautiful decorated lobby area, with concierges ready to collect our luggage, to bring to our room. Check in was easy and the tour desk had plenty of maps (street and subway) and tours on offer.
Our 2 bedroom apartment was small, which is no surprise for New York, were space is a premium, like Hong Kong and Singapore, for example. The rooms are big enough to have a double bed or 2 singles in their and one large luggage. If you have more, store them in the living area. The kitchen had the basic, pots, pans, fridge, oven, cook top, cutlery, plates and so on. If you want to cook yourself, you will be fine.  But this is New York and there are plenty of places to eat, outside the property.
The location of the property is first class. Time Square is a 5-10min walk away, Rockefeller complex, 5min walk, Central Park, 15-20min walk, starting point for the Hop on/ off bus tours, 15min walk. We even accomplished eating dinner at Eataly, walk to Empire State Building and did the night climb (fantastic view at night) and walk to the property. Pretty much, a-lot of New York was walk able, staying at this property.
Wi-Fi was below average. Weak and signal drop out’s. Trying to watch my beloved Adelaide United play in the A-League Grand Final, at 2:30am, was tense enough, let alone the frustration of a poor signal.
Next door to the property was a great little pizza place (no more then 20 seats) and they did awesome breakfast. Not far from that, was also a great Chinese restaurant. Both highly recommended.

title: Viaje en familia
text: Fuimos de viaje en familia de 5 personas por un festejo de cumpleaños. El departamento es amplio, limpio. Las habitaciones son lindas, las camas son cómodas, equipado con cocina. Muy recomendable para disfrutar de Manhattan caminando. La ubicación es excelente!!

title: Great place to stay near Times Square!
text: Location, location, location.  This hotel, called apts., is one block from Rockeller Center and Radio City Music Hall and three blocks from Times Square.  The building is older, but clean and has lots of character.  We had lots of space and a kitchenette.  The staff was excellent and helpful.  Great deal on parking directly behind the building.  Will stay there my next trip to NY.

title: Second stay, felt like "home"
text: This was our second stay at Radio City. We had a one bedroom in the back overlooking the signs on Times Square. Unfortunately, there was a building construction that worked into the late night, and was noisy. The windows are single pane so street noise is a problem. But, the room was very clean. Looked recently refurbished. There was a full size fridge, and stove with microwave and plenty of dishes/pot/pans, etc. Separate living room area. The bathroom was very small, but functional. There are no safes in the rooms, but they have a small safe deposit area in the lobby area that would hold a passport. The hotel is centrally located, one block from a subway and Rockefeller Center,and Times Square. There are steps in the entrance, but they have a lift on the sidewalk that you can use. They met us and helped with the luggage.  The desk staff were friendly and helpful. This is now a no smoking facility. I would highly recommend this hotel for families. There is a restaurant attached, and Radio City Pizza and Toasties next door, so you have plenty of reasonable food options for breakfast or anytime. Bring earplugs to help with the noise.

title: Melhor Localização
text: Localização excelente, próximo dos melhores pontos de NYC para compras, shows, teatros e vida noturna. Na melhor região da Broadway, na esquina com a Time Square. Próximo do Rockefeller Center e da luxuosa 5ª Avenida. Hospedei-me no quarto triplo com sala, cozinha americana toda equipada, quarto com duas camas bem grandes e confortáveis, banheiro com chuveiro, banheira e vaso, além de todas amenidades de banho e roupa de cama de luxo. Apartamentos espaçosos, limpos e todo mobiliados com fogão, geladeira, sofás, cafeteira, ferro de passar roupa, aquecedores, ar-condicionado e etc. Há um restaurante no térreo, porém há muitas opções de comida mais em conta aos arredores. O bairro gay de NYC situa-se apenas há duas quadras desta localidade. Meu quarto tinha uma bela vista da Time Square, tanto da sala quanto do banheiro.

title: Recomendo!!
text: Fiquei hospedada no Rádio City Apartments do dia 20 ao dia 22/6. Ótima localização (apesar do barulho das obras em frente ao edifício). Fiquei em um apartamento para 5 pessoas super confortável. Sala espaçosa com cozinha (microondas, pratos, talheres) e dois quartos (3 camas de casal ao todo). Apenas um banheiro, porém limpo e moderno. Funcionários atenciosos e receptivos. Pedimos para guardarem nossas malas após o check out e o serviço na foi cobrado! Super recomendo o apartamento!

title: A great 3-star hotel
text: I got this hotel at a discounted rate on a 3rd party website. It was a last minute decision to extend a business trip with a short getaway so I was pleasantly surprised to get a 3 1/2 star hotel in this location at that rate - it is literally on Time Square (the name is a little misleading, they are closer to Time Square than Radio City so don't ask your taxi/uber to take you to Radio City). So location was great! Hotel was comfortable and clean but more to the standard of a 3-star than a 3 1/2 star. That last half a star is not really deserved. Housekeeping had left the door wide open when I checked in and left a dirty rag on the bedside table on another day. The shower is a little cranky and there's no shower foam (but there's shampoo) provided. The rooms are really in need of a makeover, they could be used to fill a 60s show. However, I cannot emphasize this enough - the location is AWESOME!!! Just be transparent about the comfort level please.

title: Ottimo hotel in una posizione fantastica
text:
L'hotel si presenta molto bene,pulito elegante,molto confortevole,il personale è  disponibile e molto gentile.
Consiglierei di prenotare ad un piano alto (noi avevamo l'11°) per non accorgervi che New York è davvero la città che non dorme mai...
Per il resto potete decidere se usufruire della cucina comoda e ben attrezzata oppure iniziare la giornata andando a far colazione da uno degli Starbucks nei paraggi e proseguire guardando le meraviglie che New York ha da offrire mangiando nei vari Street food o nei ristoranti di cui la Grande Mela è  piena
Abbiamo alloggiato in questo hotel con i nostri 3 figli e ci torneremo sicuramente !

title: Excellent Accommodation
text: Myself and a few friends stayed at Radio City Apartments in May 2016. Amongst the group, we had stayed in two apartments. The apartments were fantastic, they were wonderfully furnished and clean. The staff were very helpful. As an added bonus, the apartments were located a minutes walk from Times Square & the subway. I will definitely be staying there the next time I come back to New York City.

title: Central New York
text: Ideal location very near Times Square. Short walk to Empire State, Rockefeller Centre. Rooms are compact with dated decor as is the inside of the building. Careful on the balconies at the lift lobbies as the stair guard rails are LOW. You'll get Vertigo on the higher floors! Bathroom had shower & wc (no bath) all of which which was Clean. Self catering facilities functional and sufficient incl full fridge (not a mini fridge). Always noise from street outside as windows have a retro fitted aircon system in the lower window pane which means the window is not sealed (piece of wood each side of aircon unit), so this allows street noise 24 /7. Ask for a higher floor to lessen the noise. Elevators are slow and stuffy. Overall very good location, clean with friendly staff. A few drawbacks.

title: Perfect location, niceand cosy, very helpful staff, very clean
text: Myself and husband stayed in studio apt - it was perfect for us two - it was small but cosy. Cleaned everyday - aircon was a little noisy but bearable. The location was perfect - couple of minutes walk to Times Square. The staff were lovely and helpful. We were given a safe free of charge. They had guest services so we could check in and print off boarding passes which was ideal. Would highly recommend these apartments

title: Excellent pour New-York sans payer trop cher
text: Situation centrale (2 minutes de Time square). Vieil hôtel bien tenu. Chambres petites mais pour New-York, c'est bien. Cuisinette dans la chambre très pratique. La clim est bruyante, apportez des bouchons, c'est toujours utile à New-York. Excellent rapport qualité/prix pour le quartier. Wi-fi inclus. Ils ont aussi une entente avec un parking tout près pour un tarif spécial.

title: Great location
text: Awesome staff! For a short stay, decent accommodation. Bit dated rooms.. Ours was a redone queen bed and adequate. Hot water a real   Issue unless we had been told to run it several minutes. Bingo.. Hot water. Maintenance issues day and night addressed immediately. Other room rented... a 2 double beds  for girls and it was not redone. Front side of building lots of light and noise. On one rainy day, staff members met us at the door out with umbrellas for everyone. So kind. Two restaurants, right of entrance, are reasonable and wonderful food choices, closest has breakfast and later,pizza. Next to it is by far the best wraps for all diets and awesome sandwiches as well as breakfast! It's a must try. The location of this hotel is the most convenient to the Square and metro and shopping and bus...just super and reasonable. They offer a AAA discount if you ask. Enjoy!

title: Very well placed right round the corner from Times Square and Subway
text: Really enjoyed our stay at the Radio City Apartments. It wasn't really luxurious, but it was clean and it was great to have a little space with two teenager boys. The kitchen was small but functional, enough with an oven, a microwave and a fridge for us to get a few bits together for breakfast and to chill a glass of wine, although we could have prepared a meal if we wanted to. Bathroom was clean and hot water good and plentiful. Beds were firm but good, pillows were a little uncomfortable but after the first night I didn't notice anymore. Such a great location and the pizza place and the Italian next door(s) were really handy. A great place to stay if you need a self catering option!

title: Hidden gem
text: This hotel worked out great for our family. It was spacious given its location and worked great for our traveling family of 5. It is steps away from the subway, has plenty of food options, and is within a few blocks of all the Broadway shows and Time Square. It's obviously an older building and the location makes loading and parking a bit more challenging, but all things to be expected with such as awesome time square location. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Great experience. Highly recommend.

title: Comodo, pulito e in ttima posizione.
text:
L'hotel e` posizionato a due passi dal Rockefeller centre. La 5th Avenue, Central Park, Broadway, Grand Central, Time Square, ecc... sono tutti facilmente raggiungibili a piedi dall'hotel.
Lo staff (quasi interamente ispanico) e` molto cortese e professionale. 
Ho prenotato una camera matrimoniale per me e mia moglie ma al check-in ci e` stato regalato un upgrade al Penthouse Apartment quindi ci siamo ritrovati in un vero a proprio appartamento con cucina, soggiorno con TV da 50 pollici e divani, tavolo, balconcino, ecc..  tutto molto bello.  Se le stanze normali seguono lo stesso stile dovrebbero essere carine e comode. non so quanto costerebbe un'appartamento ma le stanze hanno prezzi sotto la media se paragonate a cio` che si trova in zona.
Tutto pulitissimo e mantenuto bene, ci sarebbe piaciuto rimanere piu` a lungo. 
Portatevi un adattatore per le prese americane.

title: Good location,good apartment
text: Amazing!!! We have just returned from NYC with our two son's and have to say that the apartment we stayed in was spotless and bigger then we expected. This was great value for money we have stayed in a hotel before with no amenities for nearly the same money. The cleaners were in every day and did a fabby job replenishing washing up liquid and toilet rolls and fresh towels every day. Staff very helpful and apartment two minute stroll from Times Square and minute walk from subway. Cannot put into words how great our experience was. Many thanks :-)

title: Bien ubicado y en precio pero habitación muy chica
text:
El hotel está muy bien ubicado, en la 6ta y 49, a cuadras de Time Square y el Rockefeller Center. La zona es céntrica y con varios medios de transporte disponibles.
Teniendo en cuenta que los hospedajes en Nueva York son bastante caros, este hotel cumple con las expectativas de un precio acorde para la zona (que no deja de ser elevado). Como punto a favor, la cocina (kichinet) está bien equipada, hay una pequeña mesa con dos sillas y los servicios descritos por el establecimiento se cumplen. Como "detalle" negativo, el tamaño de las habitaciones es realmente pequeño. El baño, piso y artefactos lucen limpios y bien mantenidos.
Los empleados del lugar son de gran ayuda, siempre están dispuestos a dar una sugerencia o guitar a los huéspedes de ser necesario. Incluso solicitamos retrasar el checkout una hora, nos retiramos 12hs, y no hubo inconveniente.

title: Great aparment in perfect location
text: My sister and I stayed here for a week at the end of May and really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was extremely clean and the staff were ever so helpful.   The location couldnt have been better, so close to Time Square, subway station and Rockefeller Building.  Would certainly go back and will be recommending it to other people

title: Hidden Gem - Fantastic find for families or couples!
text: My friends from England came over to NYC and my wife and I met them there. We found this place which offered suites for multiples or penthouses for couples. My wife and I ended up with a penthouse, but at a reasonable price of 250/night. Very spacious, including a small kitchenette. Our friends had a 2 bedroom suite. Not sure of price, but didn't seem too bad from what I could tell. It also was very spacious for a place in NYC and also had a kitchenette. Not much of a lobby, but that is fine by me. We were within 2 minutes walk to Times Square. Entire room was very nice. Only one or two things that could be addressed, but not an impact at all. I almost didn't want to write this review as I feel it is a hidden gem and should not be overlooked.

title: Comodidad y buena atención.
text:
Me hospedé 6 dias, junto a tres personas más. El personal es muy amable y todos hablaban español, lo que hizo mucho mas amena la estadía.
Los departamentos tienen espacios generosos y bien distribuidos.
La ubicación es excelente, a metros de la Septima Avenida, cerca de Times Square y del Rockefeller Center.

title: Great place, great location!
text: My daughter and I have just arrived back from staying here for the past week. The apartments are in a great location with Times Square just around the corner. Close proximity to plenty of attractions, shops, diners and pubs. The apartments were cleaned everyday with fresh towels every day. A bit noisy but that's only to be expected near Times Square. Only minus was the elevator which took ages to come and ages to ascend and descend which we found frustrating. Staff were very helpful and pleasant. All in all a good place to stay. We would recommend these apartments.

title: Manhattan ciudad unica
text:
A los increibles museos, las obras de arte en la calles, el increible Central Park hay que añadirle la diversidad de majestuosos edificios que relatan casi un siglo de construcciones majestuosas y en un estado de conservacion unico
Cada manzana es una sorpresa, una ciudad que ni se puede dejar de conocer

title: Home from home!
text: I have lost count of the times I have stayed here. Excellent as always. Location cannot be beaten and one of the best things about this hotel is that they are constantly upgrading. The staff have all been there for years which is testament to the good management. Rooms still great value for money and it is a huge bonus to have proper kitchen facilities. The apartments are cleaned daily with clean towels etc and the guys looking after the front desk are very helpful. Have already booked again for later in the year. Subway at the end of the street, loads of delis and restaurants close by, walking distance to most mid town sights and great for the theater district. Rooms at the rear of the hotel are very quiet, but if you want a view rooms at the front are a little noisier but this has never been a problem. No complaints from me at all!

title: Close to Time square
text: Great location and value for money, a little dated. Clean and comfortable. Subway station only steps away, Rockefeller across the road. Stayed 6 nights in a two bedroom apartment, found a great Westley natural market on 8th and 54th just blocks away for anyone with food allergies and on the opposite corner is Gristedes grocery store for the usual groceries.

title: No meio do mid-town
text: O hotel é bem localizado para quem quer o agito de Manhattan. Perto do Times Square, do Rockfeller Center e Broadway. O quarto oferece cozinha - fogão, microondas e geladeira, cafeteira. Pode-se tomar café da manhã ou até almoçar no quarto. TV e ar condicionado. Cama fofa. Vale a pena.

title: Una buena opcion para viajar con niños pequeños !
text:
Muy buena ubicacion, limpieza ( las toallas las cambian y te dejan muchas) y  muy buena la atencion de los empleados.

El departamento era espacioso y muy bien equipado! Algunos departamentos aun no tienen caja fuerte. 

Los pisos mas altos son menos ruidosos y no llegan tantos los olores!

Deberian tener proteccion para niños en las escaleras.

title: A great find!
text: I found these apartments online after reading several reviews on Trip Advisor. We booked over 12 months in advance so we were able to secure a very reasonable rate. The location was excellent being an easy walk to Times Square, there was a subway station at the corner of our street about 50 metres away, & there were a few handy Indian & Chinese restaurants right next door to us which provided very good fare. We had requested a non-smoking room though when booking online it was specified that non-smoking rooms even when requested could not be promised. The first thing we noticed on entering our room was the strong pungent smell of smoke, we asked if any non-smoking rooms were available but we were told no. Our room was on the 7th floor (we had expressed a preference for 12th floor as recommended on Trip Advisor to escape the constant street noise). Air-conditioning was not ducted but provided in the form of a single a/c unit installed in the window of our room. At first I was very concerned about the noise from this a/c unit but it turned out to be a positive as the a/c noise completely drowned out any street noise. The a/c unit worked well & it was well tested as it was up to 36 degrees Celsius during our stay in NYC. Our room & ensuite bathroom were quite small but adequate for our needs for 2 people. Beds comfortable & room was clean. Our room also had a kitchenette which we put to good use as we kept milk, fruit & breakfast items in the fridge. Tea/coffee making facilities & a gas stove top were also provided. Their website advertised that a washing machine was available for guest use & so it was. We availed ourselves of this washing machine more than once. It was located in the laundry in the basement alongside the other washing machines & dryers which were used by staff to launder guests' bed linen & towels. There was no specific machine for guest use, we had to wait until a machine used by staff became available. The staff member in the laundry was a lovely fellow who assisted us by loading our washing for us when a machine wasn't immediately available, this help was so wonderful as we had a very busy sightseeing itinerary & didn't want to waste time in the laundry. The concierge staff, all male during our stay, were not particulary friendly or interactive but they did answer our questions if we asked. Overall we knew we had booked into a budget hotel & so we weren't disappointed. I would stay there again as location was far more important to us than luxury accommodation.

title: Ubicación inmejorable!
text: Recomiendo este hotel por su ubicación, a cuadras de Times Square y Rockefeller Center; nos dejaron ingresar más temprano del horario habitual y nos guardaron las maletas el último día para que pudiéramos disfrutar las horas que nos quedaban antes de partir al aeropuerto sin costo alguno. Conserjes muy amables, dispuestos siempre a solucionar cualquier inconveniente o duda, hablan español.

title: Clean, no frills
text: Great location and value. Plain, adequate size room with tiny bed alcove and tiny bathroom. Jerry Seinfeld shower that sometimes you need to turn on, go shopping, and them come back. A/C barely kept the room as cool as the outside. Great location and good value, though. Would stay again if hotels are as expensive as the week we stayed.

title: Esperaba algo mejor
text:
Muy buena ubicación , muy cercano a  Times Square y Rockefeller Center.
La habitación tenía una ventana muy pequeña, por donde apenas entraba la luz, y  a pesar de presentarlo como un pequeño departamento, de departamento sólo tenía un microondas. 
Creo que volvería sólo por la ubicación.

title: Can't wait to return :)
text:
I couldn't fault this place! The location was amazing - turn out of the hotel and turn left you have a subway station then left again Times Square (it's like a 3min walk) if you turn right you have the Rockefeller (best observation deck in New York) and if you come straight out of apartment turn right then left and keep going straight you have Central Park (10mins max) If you are facing the hotel on the right hand side is the best pizza I've ever tasted! I think it was $2.50 per massive slice, and if you buy 2 you get a free drink! Definitely worth every penny! 
The apartment itself had everything we needed! There where 5 of us and we had plenty of room! We had a 2 bedroom apartment with a sofa bed in the lounge! All the beds including sofa bed where really comfy and everything was super clean! The staff where amazing and answered all our questions with the upmost enthusiasm. We needed help finding a few things and the best ways to get there. The staff drew us maps and searched on their computers till we got the right answer! The handymen and chamber maids are a real credit to this place and would always smile and say hello! The negative reputation that the people of New York has is a total myth! 100's of times nice than Londoners! Ps. On your way to this hotel do not get a taxi from JFK to Radio City Apartments. However tired you are get the Subway!! The taxi drivers rip you off with tours and tax wether you want them or not! Unlimited metro card is $31 for a week and that was definitely our best investment!! The Subway is so easy as well!! Just follow the colours then Uptown or Downtown! Pps. If you use your metro card but don't go through then you have to use another subway or wait 18mins! We only made the mistake once! 
Enjoy :):)

title: Great Stay!
text: We loved Radio City Apartments. When we first got there, there were no ac units in our apartment. We notified the front desk and they jumped right on it. Anything we needed they were quick to bring. Would definitely recommend staying here!!!!!!!

title: 立地が最高なアパートメントタイプのホテル
text:
タイムズスクエアや地下鉄駅まで徒歩数分で行ける。
マンハッタンをあちこち行きたいのならオススメなホテル。

1ベットルームアパートメントタイプに宿泊。
ベットルームとリビングが分かれているので広く、子供連れでしたが、スーツケースを広げても子供が十分遊べるスペースがありました。
アパートメントタイプで、キッチンや大きな冷蔵庫、電子レンジ、食器（洗剤もあり）、コーヒーメーカー付き。
TVがベットルームとリビングにそれぞれ1台。
バスタブはない部屋でしたが、広いシャワー室がありました。

鍵が二つで、ドア開けるときに分かりづらくて苦戦しました。
繁華街が近いこともあり、夜でもかなり騒がしいので、静かに過ごしたい人には不向きなホテルです。

NYのホテルの金額の高さを考えたら、あちこち出かけて、帰って寝るだけならコスパはいい方なのかなと思いました。

title: Bom hotel pela localização. Péssimo atendimento
text: A localização  é muito boa. O apartamento é pequeno mas tem uma cozinha. O que é muito bom! Tem geladeira, fogão, microondas, pia, cafeteira, pratos, talheres, panelas. 3 quadras dali tem um mercado bem bom. Na esquina da 8 ave. Fica a passos da Times Square. Ponto ruim: os rapazes da recepção são muito rudes e mal-humorados

title: Great location - decent room if you need an 'apartment'
text: Don't expect a 5-star quality or ANY extras from this property, but if you are looking for something in Times Square/Broadway area and need two rooms and a some kitchenette, this is fine.  This definitely used to be an apartment building because it has just a small lobby and rooms.  The building is kind of run down, the furniture plain and old, the bedding marginal.  BUT, the room was clean and the three beds were fine for a family.  Most of the people we saw were small groups and families.  We paid about $300 a night - you can't find anything for this price in the area that is also an apartment.  ALSO - a non-smoking hotel with free wifi

title: Don't expect an apartment !
text: Central location walking distance to Times Square, Rockefeller Centre, Central Park and Broadway. More a hotel room with fridge and microwave than apartment, no sink except in bathroom.Jaded appearance but daily room service and clean with coffee supplies topped up daily. Lift was biggest problem. Two lifts but one was broken all the 5 days of our stay. Quicker to get up to Rockefeller Observation Deck than our 12th floor, and on last day waited 15 minutes with cases to get down to lobby as lower floors were intercepting and filling lift before it made it to our floor. C'est la vie, but wouldn't stay here again or recommend.

title: Location can't be beat
text: This is the second time I have stayed here and it is even nicer now as the lobby has been renovated.  Our room was a double studio and was quite small with two double beds, but it had a fridge, a microwave, and a kettle and the bathroom was spotless and very nice. I love the location so much and the price is good for New York.  If you book through their website they will give you a 10% discount with an AAA card.

title: Greit leilighetshotell, sentralt
text:
Greit og hyggelig leilighetshotell i sentrum av New York, få skritt fra Times Square. 
Gangavstand til mange severdigheter som Central Park, Manhattan mm.
Vi hadde problemer med å få lukket enkelte vinduer helt igjen, og noen steder var det litt rar lukt. Teppebelagte rom, greie senger, rimelig bra kjøkkenkrok. Suitene har to store senger ( plass til 4) på soverommet og sovesofa med plass til to i stuen. Greit bad. Ettromsleilighetene er ganske trange, men har samme kjøkkenseksjon, store senger og en liten spiseplass. Vi følte at vi fikk god valuta for pengene her.

title: Great place , would stay again
text: Four of us stayed in a one bedroom apartment with two Queen beds and one pull down in the living room .Much better than a hotel room as we had a large living room cum kitchen with all the facilities for cooking etc. Plus its in a great location Times Square is just around the corner ,room cleaned every day.The adjoining Italian restaurant was lovely too.

title: Great stay
text:
Very well located hotel, nearby all commodities, entertainment and public transportation. The hotel is at the center of everything, a 20min ride express to downtown or uptown with 3 lines located in a 300m radius. 

Rooms are nicely furnished with the necessary accessories for an enjable stay. Decoration is old but functional. Rooms are cleaned everyday and refilled with coffee packs (very important). Bed is comfy. The small downsides were that windows couldn't be opened (at least not easily) and bathtubs aren't equipped with a retractable shower head. Hotel is equipped with a laundry service in the basement and an iron in the room in case. 

The staff is friendly and nice. A place I'd recommend for sure.

title: Perfect location and reasonable price!
text:
We have booked our stay months in advance and had a pretty good deal. We had a very noisy vent outside our room (from one of the restaurants below) but it stops between 11pm and 7am so it wasn't too much of a hassle, when we pointed it out to reception they offered to change our room which was very kind but we decided to stay as it wasn't bothering us during the night.
The location is absolutely PERFECT: safe, close to the subway, 5 minutes from Times Square, 5th Avenue, Rockefeller Center ad lots of attractions. We definitely want to visit the NYC again and this will be the first accommodation we check - highly recommended!

title: Great Location.
text: Very nice stay for few days as location is perfect, close to subway and different shops and attractions on Time Square! Room was comfortable size. Friendly staff.  Clean & quiet . Very nice breakfast place just next doors. Comfy:)

title: The heart of the theatre district
text: Very central, near to Times Square  and other sites. Very clean apartments and serviced each day. A lot of Art Deco features which may appear dated but we loved it. Reception very helpful and pleasant.

title: Amazing
text: The apartment was amazing I would highly recommend them. They are in a great location within minutes of Time Square, Rockerfella centre. There are numerous bars and restaurants within easy location, very good Italian restaurant which is part of the apartments. 24 hour desk , the staff are very polite and helpful. I'd definitely stay there again

title: Geweldige locatie voor een schappelijke prijs!
text:
Het hotel is niet het allermodernste hotel dat je tegen zal komen maar het ligt op een perfecte locatie en de kamers zijn redelijk ruim, zeker voor hartje New York. 

Wij hadden een kamer met twee queen bedden en ze lagen heerlijk. De badkamer was niet al te groot maar schoon en de douche had een stevige straal. De kamer wordt elke dag schoongemaakt, tevens worden de handdoeken vervangen (sowieso zijn er hier genoeg van) en er waren ook volop zeepjes, shampoo en zelfs mondwater. 

Niets is zo fijn als een koelkast op je kamer te hebben zodat je wat drinken en eten kan bewaren. Verder bevatte de keuken een magnetron, fornuis en bestek en servies. 

Er was kabel-tv op de kamer met een ruim aanbod aan zenders en ook de mogelijkheid om programma's terug te krijgen. Natuurlijk ga je hiervoor niet naar New York maar het is wel lekker om 's avonds even de voeten te laten rusten en tv te kijken.

Het personeel was erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Toen ik binnenkwam met een grote pizzadoos begonnen ze te applaudiseren en wenste mij een veel succes. Dat brengt me gelijk op eten in de buurt: er zijn ontzettend veel mogelijkheden om te eten (supermarkten helaas een stuk minder) maar ik kan de pizzeria onder/naast het hotel van harte aanraden. Lekker verse pizza voor een zeer redelijke prijs en ook de chicken roll is een aanrader.

De locatie zoals al eerder aangegeven is perfect: vlak bij Times Square, Top of the Rock en anders bezienswaardigheden en ook vlak bij meerdere metro-stations. 

Volgende keer dat wij naar New York gaan, zullen wij zeker hier weer verblijven.

title: Not bad at all
text: These are not modern apartments by any means but they are very clean and everything you need and expect (unless you go to New York to make toast) the staff were all very friendly and helpful, we did have a blockage in the toilet when we arrived, not a big problem, maintenance guy knocked on the door 2 mins after I reported it, about 1.30am, he fixed the problem and left, took 5 mins. The building itself is old fashioned, but that's half the attraction and it is 2 blocks from time square, and only 5 mins from Time Square diner which is worth a visit or 3 x

title: Excellent location!
text:
Visited NYC for New Years Eve 2016 and booked this hotel 6 months in advance for a great price on Booking.com.  Excellent location for Times Square and the subway to get anywhere you need.  We went to the Supanova party at the Novotel for NYE and it was only a short walk away and we were within the blocked off area and felt very safe and it wasn't crises or anything.

The room itself was small but that is expected for NYC. It was clean and fairly quiet and we couldn't ask for a bêtter room for the fe nights we need it. Would definitely recommend it and would stay there again in a heartbeat.

title: Great Bargrin
text: I've stayed at RCA on many occasions with family and with girlfriends.  The rooms are clean and up to date.  Being able to have a drink & snacks before heading out for the night then relaxing with breakfast in the morning is ideal.  There is no real lobby with a concierge but the front desk guys are more than friendly and helpful when asked questions - they got us to Brooklyn by subway!  The bathrooms are all updated with the fluffiest towels I've ever used. Location is great - 1 block to either Time Square or Rockerfella Center or subway.  Parking is around the corner and you get $25.00 off per day.

title: LOVE this place
text:
We stayed here in March this year.  Went over to see the St Patrick's Day Parade.  The apartment was fabulous, spotless and just the perfect size for the two of us.  Little kitchen are with a full sized fridge freezer and cooker.

It's perfectly positioned for the bustle of Times Square and the underground.  Lots of great pubs and eateries around not to mention the shopping.  Would definitely return.

title: Amazing location and price
text:
You get value here! Kitchenette, bath and 50m from Times Square! Amazing food at your door step and walking to everything!

No problems with accommodation at all! Bed was comfy, room clean and staff friendly. Wifi was such a great bonus too! 

Friends stayed up the road in a smaller room for double the cost! It is s but noisy at night, but that's what you get when you stay in that location!

title: Great Location - needed earplugs
text:
The location of Radio City is great, so close to Times Square and has an Italian restaurant attached to it which is fabulous 
We were also able to do washing there which was fantastic as we didn't want to worry at the next stop, the only thing was washing could only be done between 8pm - 5am but it was super cheap $1 for a wash and free for the dryer.

I would recommend if you are staying there to take earplugs as the noise from the surrounding traffic was insane and we were in the 10th floor. 
The rooms were also a little small. We had a queen room with kitchenette and really struggled to get two bags in there with us and the beds were rather hard and little uncomfortable for us, but you might prefer that!

title: Ingen luxus, men...
text: 4 person I leilighet.  1 soverom med 2 queen size senger og et oppholdsrom med kjøkken.  Rent var det.  Veldig slitt, men så lenge det er rent spiller det ingen rolle.  Lå helt perfekt til Times Square og Rockefeller Center.  Rett ved buss stasjonen til Common Woodbury Outlet.   Hyggelig betjening.

title: Perfect place to stay with a group
text: We rented the apartments for two nights for four people and loved it. This space seems about as close to apartment-living experience as one can get as an out-of-towner. Full kitchen/dining/living space, two bedrooms, a full bath, and space to maneuver around one another and give each other privacy. Convenient to the theater district, wonderful staff, extremely clean--would stay here every time I visit if I can. Note that the elevators are small and a little cramped but otherwise fine.

title: au coeur de Time Square
text: excellent emplacement, à 1mn de Time Square, près du Rockfeller center, du Moma, de Grand Central Terminal, du métro, etc...le concept appart hotel est parfait, car vous êtes libre de manger à l'extérieur, mais aussi dans l'appartement, avec une superette Emporium, tout près, avec des aliments de qualité.Le personnel de Radio City apartments est à votre écoute, et vous disposez de machines à laver le linge au sous-sol de l'établissement.la décoration rappelle les années 50, mais c'est New-York, avec l'ancien, et le moderne.j'y suis encore pour une semaine,et je suis ravi.je recommande cet établissement.

title: Una excelente opción. Ubicación y limpieza.
text: Nos hemos quedado en cuatro ocasiones en este maravilloso y sencillo hotel. Todas ellas excelentes. Limpieza y comodidad de 10. Siempre en el Penthouse B. Lo recomiendo ampliamente. La ubicación inmejorable.

title: Sweet Hotel, perfect location.
text: Had a rough start on arrival with a cold and unfriendly concierge. Nonetheless I was checked into my Deluxe Studio for 2nights. It was impeccably clean with all the amenities stated. At some point I had a bit of an issue with my Water Closet and the maintenance guy was sent up in 3mins. Really impressed. On my last night I was checked into a Studio with a Queen bed which was equally clean. There is a subway within 60seconds walk with access to the NQR lines. The other concierge on duty were very polite and friendly. In all, it was a great stay. By the way, still awaiting the refund of my $250 mandatory caution fee. Yep, you get to pay a $250 caution fee which will be refunded to your account when you check out.

title: Vivez New York en direct
text:
Idéalement situé au cœur de Manhattan, à quelques pas de Times square tout en étant dans la 49e rue. 
Le métro -au pied de l'hôtel-  vous emmène vers le sud de Manhattan ( Ground zero, Wall Street, ferry pour la statue de la liberté).
Le service est impeccable. Nous avons eu un problème technique à 23h00. Dans les 5 minutes après notre appel, une personne intervenait pour le résoudre. Peut etre une isolation imparfaite mais bien fatigués de notre périple, nous n'avions pas de difficulté pour nous endormir.
L'appartement était nettoyé tous les jours.

Une excellente adresse que je recommande.

title: Excelente ubicaci{on, mejor atención y algunos tips sobre NYork
text:
A raíz de la recomendaci{on de unos amigos, decidí reservar un apartamento en este Edificio   Se halla muy bien ubicado (49 casi 7ma y estación de metro a unos pasos) El dpto asignado era un poco pequño, pero ante el pedido formulado en el front-desk, enseguida me cambiaron al Pent House A del último piso
Y ahí si valió la pena (La diferencia en dinero no es muy significativa)
Por lo demás, como anticipé, la ubicación es magnífica y la atención del personal (casi todos hispano parlantes) excelente   Aunos pasos se halla un restaurant japonés de comida muy casera (no tiene sushi) que se llama SAPORO y es muy confiable   A dos cuadras (49 y 8va) ahy un supermercado en la esquina y también , en la aprte de arriba un lugar donde uno puede comer algo, abierto casi toda la noche.
Tips: en la salida del metro ,línea n| 1, en la 72 del West Side, se encuentra el OUTLET de Bloomingdales con excelentes productos (hay que revisar : Polo Ralph Laurent; Tommy; etc) a casi un tercio de lo que los venden en los negocios de las respectivas marcas   También se encuentran productos muy baratos (revisando) en Marshall's
Para pasar a Brooklyn, nada mejor que ir caminando a la ida, cruzando el puente y, al regreso es excelente la experiencia de volver en el Sea River Ferry que no solamente lleva desde DUMBO a Williamsbourg, sino que también cruza a Manhattan y nos deja en la 34th East y el río
Para viajar en metro, lo mejor es la Metrocard que se aduqiere en boletería o las máquinas y pueden volver a recargarse en esas mismas máquinas, con los montos que uno desee y tiene traducción al español  Es muy sencillo
.
